World building is really cool so far and I'm having a blast playing. I hope it doesn't change!

Reviews:
É um jogo curto e bem caprichado! Você tem que passar por plataformas e diversos "quebra-cabeças" controlando três personagens, um guerreiro, mago e a arqueira (cada qual tem sua habilidade). Me lembrei muito quando fechei o primeiro jogo "Unravel". Ambos os games possuem seus graus de dificuldade, aqui você anda num ambiente encantado, cheio de cores e luzes. O que me encantou é a qualidade gráfica do jogo, a jogabilidade tranquila também. 

Valeu a pena cada centavo gasto nele. O JOGO É TOP! <3 | The game boasts an exceptionally high-quality production, making it a model for two to three-player games. However, the flaws in the mechanics of the first instalment are evident, with significant differences in the efficiency of different characters when progressing through levels. This disparity is especially pronounced in multiplayer mode, where some characters can feel quite underwhelming. | 6.5/10 還算很有意思的小遊戲，可以全程跟朋友連線(最多三名玩家)!! 可以趁特價買起來玩:)
 | Trine is a bit old but the visuals are still amazing. Played through with my gf and we had loads of laughs and good times. | 很难想象这居然是10多年前的游戏质量，无论是音乐，画质，建模，游戏性简直都太棒了，一个个充满着制作者巧妙布局的关卡，配合上唯美而又动听的音乐，美轮美奂的场景和惊奇的宝物道具，轻松而又惬意的剧情，虽然过程不长，但是依然能感受到创作者在里面投入的心血，感谢你们让我体验到了一个魔幻而又充满搞笑气氛的奇幻史诗世界！10分！

Super fun destruction in game with a thin story and pretty empty world but theres enough here to get you to the end I like this game better than red faction 2 and what came after. | è un classico ed ha una distruttibilità degli ambienti che fa invidia a giochi moderni, se ti piace il retro game (anche se questo non è così tanto retro game) è un esperienza interessante | "Mason, drive the Killdozer through the government buildings."
"OK, Commander!" | 内容は平凡ですが、売りの「壊し」は楽しかったです。 | W Red Faction Guerrilla Steam Edition gracz sam decyduje, kogo, kiedy, gdzie i jak zaatakować.

Wykorzystuj taktykę guerilli, improwizowaną broń i zmodyfikowane pojazdy, aby prowadzić ataki na cele EDF.

Prowadź akcje w swoim własnym stylu, wykonuj misje w dowolnej kolejności lub angażuj się w destrukcyjne działania, aby osłabić kontrolę EDF nad Marsem.

Wykorzystuj zniszczenie na swoją taktyczną korzyść, zastawiając pułapki lub tworząc łańcuchowe eksplozje, aby atakować wrogie twierdze i trwale zmieniać środowisko gry.

Przetoruj sobie drogę przez nieustannie zmieniający się krajobraz, improwizując taktykę walki – mieszaj style gry, pojazdy, broń i materiały wybuchowe, aby pokonać EDF.

Eksploruj rozległe, nieprzyjazne tereny Marsa, od odludnego górniczego posterunku Parker po lśniącą stolicę EDF – Eos.

Przemierzaj całkowicie zniszczalne, otwarte środowiska pełne sił EDF, walczących członków Ruchu Czerwonej Frakcji i udręczonych osadników uwięzionych w ogniu walki.

Nie ma miejsca na chowanie się, gdy wystawisz swoje umiejętności guerilli na próbę w różnych, pełnych destrukcji trybach wieloosobowych.
cleaned_review: a classic game with a thin story and pretty empty world but there's enough here to get you to the end I like this game better than red faction 2 and what came after

Reviews:
Essa versão é o remaster do jogo de 2009 que ficou um pouco melhor que o original.
Se vc tem problema de jogar o o jogo em inglês, existe uma tradução de PT-BR do pessoal tribo gamer, mas não testei essa tradução pra ver se tem alguma divergência com o jogo 

Vc controla um minerador que junta com a rebelião contra a opressão (edf) por um motivo (só isso kkk).

Pontos positivos: O jogo é de mundo aberto e se destaca com as destruições de cenários, dá pra destruir praticamente todas as estruturas. O legal é pegar uma bazuca e fazer estragos nos prédios kkk.
Fica mais legal quando a rebelião se junta durante o tiroteio.
Não tive problema na otimização.

Pontos negativos: a história é genérica, missões secundárias ficam legais no começo e mais tarde fica cansativo, inteligência artificial dos aliados que ficam saindo do carro quando estão de carona com vc e inimigos.

OBS: Existe um modo que vc joga com SAM como se fosse dlc mas é do próprio jogo.

O jogo vale a pena pegar na promoção pra se divertir, parece que os jogos antigos estão muitos bem trabalhados e completos do que os jogos atuais, dá pra ver que foi feito com carinho cada detalhes das estruturas, veículos, roupas do jogo.

Terminei o jogo com 15 horas de duração. | So first off, not the worst but not the best. It IS definitely a classic worth owning, that being said It is a classic with the problems of it's time. So if your new to the game remember that. There IS story but not really the focus, the focus of the game was it's destruction system, If you played Just Cause 2 and up it's basically that story wise and game-play wise except on mars and no flight ability. I like the game as a not so serious Legal weed edible on and off game. I play it to blow stuff up in creative ways and not think too much about anything else. If you play on above normal thou be prepared to kill many people as the enemy may and will drown you in themselves and watch ammo. Try and not to be too sympathetic about allies dying as they are as dumb as they can be and show up often without request and are at best expendable distraction, they can also make things worse if your trying to be selective in your destruction. The best way to save them is to not see them die and lose your alert level.

The game for what it is....Is simple. What you do in the game you will be doing till the end of it with enough upgrades and story to get you to it's end. A classic with flaws to be sure but in terms of entertainment it's sure to be better than nothing and worth a grab on sale or full price. The game after this one is not worth buying. | Aw man, this is probably one of the best games from the 7th console generation. This is THE example of gameplay over narrative.

Would it be better with a good story? Sure, maybe... But does a game with destruction mechanics that are still highly intricate and advanced 15+ years later really need to have a deep story? Mindlessly smash and explode your problems away until you bring down the entire political system of Mars.

You're the good guy in this, trust me :3 | -геймдизайн. выглядит как говно и играется так же.
-сюжет. игра за правильных террористов, когда их называют сопротивлением.
-графика. дешево-кривоватое. | Grab the hammer and start looking at buildings in a different way. Time to de-stress after a long day.

Red Faction Guerrila was a simple game with a simple story but a enjoyable one with a couple of things that could have some better design choices. Right from the the start you know what to expect in the game. You know what areas there is to explore and what to do to restore them to what they were before thing gone bad. The EDF is here and they are not welcome, the barricades, the defenses, the turrents, all most be gone and lucky for you, you will have a great arsenal to make things easier. There are 6 areas for you to focus in the main story and plenty of side activities to keep you busy but not enough for you to get burn out doing them all. I finished around 30 activities and after that I felt I've seen everything there was to see and the remaining would be more copy and paste without anything new so I stopped doing them and went back to the main story.  

Performance wise I only got a crash to the desktop and it was during the DLC main mission. Aside of that, when exiting the game I got a black screen a couple of times, nothing serious. Pushing the FOV to the max makes the game feels so much better, I highly recommend it. Gameplay wise it's a solid game but could have better mechanics. The cars feel a little too stiff when cornering and wobbly on the desert segments. Guns are more than enough and it does not get old destrying everything. Be cautious of how you use them because the AI allies tend to be a little too close for you and sometimes when swinging the hammer the worst can happen. It wouldn't be too bad if you didn't get a morale penalty when your allies die. Speaking of dying, you also get lower morale when you die so if you are dying too much just drop the difficulty down and you'll be good to go. The music feels good and gave me some Mad Max vibes. The world does not offer much variety and cut-scenes could be better looking but it's normal considering the initial release of the game.
 
12 hours after, I finished the main game with some side activities. The DLC is well worth your time and it's a quick one with around 2 more hours from start to finish. I got all the activities and main missions as well destroying everything in the DLC in two gaming sessions.
cleaned_review: The game is a bit better than the original, but it is still a bit better than the original.

Reviews:
I remember having played this game when I was a younger and wanting to try it again... I've played a lot of ARPGs in my time and this game just isn't good, not with the lots of other games there are nowadays and that were there even during its time. I didn't go into it with wanting to dislike it, but have not really found many things to like, or at the very least enough for me to like the game, enjoy my experience, and give it a positive review.

I'm not a fan of the graphics, but that's always been the least important aspect when it comes to games for me, but I can't believe this game is from 2009 judging from... well, everything. The graphics didn't age well (looks like a cheap mobile game), amount of classes (3?!), mechanics, skills and skill trees (every class has 15 active and 15 passive skills), loot (a lot of trash drops) and the controls and combat - very clunky, I tried playing a Vanquisher (kind of a Rogue/Marksman class) and the ranged attacks usually either didn't even connect or only had range for about half the screen.

I'd have expected the game to be at least 10 years older than that, everything just feels so lackluster and jank for its time. If it were, I wouldn't have been so harsh with the review but simply put, there were games that were miles ahead at the time - Titan Quest or Diablo II, which lo and behold, are still very good and playable to this day, even in spite of being older.

There are some nice ideas, like the pet, being able to send it back to town to sell your items. If only the inventory wasn't 3x7, while also having to carry scrolls and potions, making it at least 4 slots smaller. Other than that though, the pet is just basically a way worse and dumbed-down version of the Diablo II mercenary. The only other "good" thing about the game is that you can mod it and the mods don't disable steam achievements, at least the ones I installed. This would be good if the base game itself was good and if some mods just didn't feel mandatory to make the experience less painful.

Now if we move on to the cons, other than everything already mentioned above, there is no respec, why? Yes, there is a mod for it, but still. There were games before its time that had this mechanic, so why does this game not have it?

I am playing in very hard softcore and the game still feels very easy regardless of that, which brings me to the balance being very poor - still remember my first death, which was to a trapped chest dealing over 50% of my health in a zone 5 levels below me, while literally every single other trap I've triggered dealt about 1/10 of the damage of this one, pretty much not even moving my health bar. I just don't get it. On top of that, the monster damage on very hard gets absurd very quickly, even before completing the story you're gonna start getting constantly oneshot with very little counterplay, unless you're of course kiting around half the map and standing half a screen away from the mobs.

This game didn't bring anything new at the time that would be meaningful and worthwhile enough to mention. Unless you're going into the game with extremely strong nostalgia, can't recommend. It is cheap though, so I'll at least give it that. | . São 3 personagens fixos e sem nome, não tem como customizar a aparência, cada um é uma classe diferente. 
. A mulher usa armas de fogo, o grandalhão é o berserker e o magrelo é o mago.
. Na árvore de habilidades, existem 3 abas para cada um, sendo possível criar builds diferentes sempre que for jogar e também usar armas de outras classes, basta possuir os status necessários para empunhar a arma.
. No início escolhemos um pet, lobo ou lince. E ele ajuda muito durante o gameplay, porque tanka os inimigos, pode se transformar em monstros de acordo com o tipo de peixe que você o alimentar, equipa acessorios, sobe de level, usa magias, pega itens no chão pra você, vende seus itens na cidade retornando até você em menos de 2min e tem inventário para carregar itens.
. São 4 níveis de dificuldade escolhido no inicio e há um modo chamado HARDCORE onde ativa a morte permanente. Sim, se morrer já era.
. Na cidade você pega quests, conversa com NPCs, vende e compra itens, há 2 baús para guardar seus itens sendo que um serve para guardar itens compartilhando-os com seus outros chars criados. Mas char normal não compartilha itens com char hardcore.
. Gameplay é muito baseado em Diablo onde você vai nas dugeons, andar por andar explorando em visão aérea tipo no League of Legens, inclusive os gráficos lembram muito a versão antiga do LoL.

Eu achei muito viciante e desafiador no modo HARDCORE. Recomendo! Nota 9/10 | [h1] Cozy ARPG for fans of Diablo 1[/h1]
[h3] Should play well on almost all systems [/h3]

I love this game. I used to play it on my low spec netbook that struggled even running chrome, it ran this game well. There are a ton of better ARPGs out there, but none of them are as "minimalist" as this one. Single dungeon with multiple levels, basic classes and skills, small town with quest givers. It is a bare bones ARPG and that is not necessarily a bad thing. Not having to stress over synergies (non existent) complex skill trees (as basic as they come) makes this game perhaps the coziest ARPG out there. 

[b]Not recommended if you are looking for deep game mechanics, complex builds or modern quality of life improvements. [/b]



 | Torchlight is a simple and solid Dungeon Crawler, held back by a lack of QOL aswell as an atrocious difficulty spike in the later part of the game that killed the enjoyment for me.
Despite some hiccups, Torchlight is still a really fun budget title. I recommend it on a sale. The only thing that would complete this game for me is if it had multiplayer, but Torchlight 2 has it, so maybe you'd want to pick up that one instead. | Decent and fun diablo-type game, but a lot easier to get into. Was one of the first games I ever played and it's nice to return to it after so long.
cleaned_review: dated

Game Name: The Witcher: Enhanced Edition Director's Cut
Reviews:
Bu incelemeyi yazmak için uzunca bir süre bekledim aslında..

Sebebine birazdan değineceğim.

[i]Abi o oyunun kombat sistemi çok kötü nasıl dayanabiliyorsun ?
Abi o oyunda boşuna vakit kaybetme 2. oyundan başlarsan hikayenin ne olduğunu anlarsın.
Abi o oyunun grafikleri çok kötü ya 5 dakika oynadıktan sonra etrafı piksel görmeye başladım.[/i]

Bunlar burada dursun..
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Yapmayın oğlum söylemeyin şöyle şeyler..

Genel anlamda internet ortamında açıkça ve rahatlıkla eleştiri yapacak bir düzeye gelmişken ayrıca bir çok şeye tek bir tıkla ulaşıp araştırma imkanınız varken kendi fikirlerinizi oluşturmayıp neden başkalarından duyduğunuz şeyleri savunuyor ve insanlara yanlış algılar hediye ediyorsunuz ?

Yapmayın..

"Gerekli laf söyleme kısmını geçtiğimi göre şimdi oyundan bahsedebiliriz"

Her şeyin başlangıcı olarak verilmese de karakteri tanımamız ve hikayeyi anlayabilmemiz için gerekli oyun olarak karşımıza çıkıyor Witcher 1.

Çok güzel bir senaryo hazırlanmış öncesi hakkında bir fikrimiz yok sonrası ise tamamen muamma ilerledikçe kendimize ve hikayeye dair ip uçları ediniyor ve bir şekilde kafamızda yaşananları şekillendirmeye başlıyoruz.

[spoiler]Oyunun en başında karşımıza çıkan çocuğun en sonunda karşımıza çıkacağını kim bilebilir ki ?[/spoiler]

Oyun sırasında çok fazla npc ile diyalog kurabiliyor ana karakterimiz adına seçim yapmamız gereken çok fazla sahne ile karşılaşıyoruz.

Yetenek ağacı ise gerçekten harika oynamak istediğiniz stile yatırım yaptıkça harika kombolar ve hızlandırmalar sunuyor.

Dövüş sistemi sanıldığının aksine birazcık refleks birazcık dikkatli oynamak mantığında ilerliyor yeterli upgrade'leri alırsanız karşınızdaki 10 kişiyi havada 5 takla atarak inanılmaz artist şekillerde kesebiliyorsunuz.

Görev mantığı ise harika tüm oyunlarında olduğu gibi hangisinin side hangisinin main quest olduğunu size veriyor ve en önemli kısmı o görevleri yapabilmek için sadece bulunduğunuz haritada değil başka haritalara gidip gelebiliyorsunuz.

"Emek veriyorsunuz"

Bu oyun için gerçekten emek veriyorsunuz eski olmasına rağmen tek bir anında bile beni sıkmayan başından saatlerce kalkmadığım bir oyun oldu Witcher benim için.

Her anında insanları tek tek tanımak hikayelerini dinlemek yeri geldiğinde sarhoş olup ağzınlarından laf almak yeri geldiğinde genel evdeki kızlara çiçek götürmek her anı ile gerçekten harika bir oyun Witcher 1.

Yaptığım seçimler sırasında gerçekten zorlandığım noktalar oldu ben olsam ne yapardım Gerald aslında ne yapar kısımlarında bazı seçim ekranlarında oturup düşünmüşlüğüm var ve her şeyin sonunda tamamen benim verdiğim kararlara göre şekillenmiş bir son çıktı karşıma.,

Oyun beni tatmin etti mi ? Fazlasıyla..
Oyundan keyif aldım mı ? İnanılmaz derece..
Peki oyunun grafikleri çok mu kötü ? Hayır kesinlikle değil
Peki oyunun combat sistemi çok mu saçma ya da çok mu zor ? Hayır aslında inanılmaz basit
Peki gerçekten hikayeyi anlamak için ilk oyunu oynamamız mı gerekiyor ? "EVET"

Neden bu kadar agresif cevaplar veriyorum ? şu yüzden..

Oyuna başladığım günün sabahında Discord da masum masum oyunu oynuyorken discordda ki arkadaşlarımızdan birisi yanıma geldi ve sırf Enis K. isimli youtuber'ın videosunu izlediği için abi o oyuna rework şart yaa gibisinden bir cümle kullandı..
Mikrofondan yumruk atabilmeyi gerçekten çok isterdim..

İlk oyunu oynamana gerek yok diğer oyunlarda hikayeyi anlayabiliyorsun diyen arkadaşlarım dostlarım..
İlk oyunda öldürüp öldürmemenin kararı sana bırakılmış karakterler diğer oyunda sırf senin yaptığın seçime göre karşına çıkabiliyorken..
3. Oyunda dahi diyaloğa gireceğimiz karakterlerin başlangıç hikayelerini ilk oyunda öğrenirken..
Firma oyunun hikayesinin temelini ilk oyunda yaptığını açıklamışken ne demek lan ilk oyunu oynama diğer oyunlarda anlaşılıyor ??

Düşünsene Matrix'i öneriyorsun arkadaşına ve diyorsun ki ilk film'i izleme adam işte Matrix oluyor..
Lan oluyor da o sırada yaşadıkları ne oluyor ? o etrafındaki insanlar nereden geliyor ? o herif Matrix olana kadar neler çekiyor ?

Oyun indirim döneminde ciklet parasına kadar düşüyorken lütfen alıp kendiniz tecrübe edin..
Yine beğenmezseniz ben hep buradayım. Oturur konuşur tartışırız.


Dikkat: " Bu incelemeyi okurken yorum ekranında bol bol devrik cümle, erken bitirilmiş diyaloglar ve açıklamalarda yumuşatılma hissedebilirsiniz. İnsanlara atar yapmamam gerektiğini kendime söyleyerek yazmış birisi olarak bu açıklamayıp da yapma gereksinimi duydum " 

Teşekkürler.


 | Este jogo é incrível, mas não é para todos, ele possui uma complexidade tática única, o que vai faz muita gente achar ele difícil quando na verdade se você usar a estratégia certa ele fica relativamente fácil.

[b]Jogue este o jogo se você:[/b]
[list]
[*] Gosta de Leitura.
[*] Gosta de RPG.
[*] Gosta de explorar.
[*] Gosta de Jogos com características táticas complexas.
[*] Gosta de jogos clássicos como os primeiros Dark Souls e Neverwinter Nights.
[*] Tem disposição para coletar e craftar itens.
[/list]

[b]Evite este jogo se:[/b]
[list]
[*] Não gosta de Leitura, (Há muita coisa para ler no jogo)
[*] Não gosta de RPG ou escolhas complexas.
[*] Não gosta de ficar perdendo tempo falando com todos npcs e entrando em todos os lugares.
[*] Gosta apenas de lutar metendo a espada nos inimigos sem frescuras como magia e alquimia.
[*] Não gosta de jogos datados ou com jogabilidade estranha.
[*] Não quer perder tempo coletando e craftando itens.
[/list]

[b]Alquimia[/b]

O uso de poções não é opcional, é OBRIGATÓRIO. Neste jogo você precisa coletar itens como plantas e partes de animais, comprar e ler formulas para poções e óleos, crafta-los e usar de acordo com o contexto, inimigo e sua estratégia. Essas informações custam caro no jogo, tanto em tempo conversando com npcs quanto em ouro para comprar as formulas. 

[b]Inimigos e Combates[/b]

A parte mais divertida para mim e mais odiada para outros. No jogo você possui uma espada de prata e uma de aço, além de 3 estilos de combate, você precisa usar a arma certa no estilo de combate certo contra o inimigo certo, e juntamente com isso combinar a magia e alquimia para explorar as fraquezas dos adversários, isso é fundamental especialmente nos chefes. 

Os pontos fracos dos monstros e chefes do jogo também não são de graça, você precisa comprar livros, e falar com npcs para descobri-los, o que você pode facilmente perder durante a progressão do game ou simplesmente ficar sem dinheiro para adquirir as informações, deixando o game mais difícil e menos rico em termos de lore. De posse da informação você precisa ficar consultado o codex do jogo para elaborar as estratégias de combate. 

As coisas não explicitas no codex, por exemplo, ele diz que o chefe do primeiro capitulo é pouco vulnerável a magia Aard, se você se deu o trabalho de aprender ou usar a magia Aard em combate sabe que ela tonteia os inimigos possibilitando que você os mate com um só golpe. 

De posse dessas duas informações você pode elaborar a estratégia de fortalecer o Aard para matar o chefe "super difícil" do capitulo 1 com apenas um golpe.  Mas cabe ao jogador chegar nesta conclusão e planejar com antecedência. Parece algo simples mas a maioria dos jogadores não o fazem pois jogam irrefletidamente. [b]The Witcher não vai te pegar pela mão. cabe a você pegar os insumos que o jogo te oferece para ter uma boa experiência[/b].

[b]História[/b]

A lore da série witcher dispensa comentários, só não posso deixar de mencionar que em diversos momentos o jogo tem coloca entre escolhas morais de fritar a cabeça. Você sempre se pega tentando entender qual a coisa certa até se dar conta que no jogo não existe isto de coisa certa, e que ninguém é inocente.

Uma coisa importante é que a história avança de forma inesperada, é normal coisas ficarem para trás na primeira jogada, sempre tenha isso em mente ao entrar em um lugar ou completar uma quest, as vezes o jogo avança e algumas quests não podem ser completadas, outras o jogador acaba deixando passar. Desta forma o jogo tem um valor alta para quem for re-jogar. | Après avoir fini le jeu en 63h, je ne peux que le recommander.

Certes, il n'est plus au goût du jour, mais n'oublions pas qu'il date de 2008 : 

-  la fluidité des mouvements n'est pas celle d'un jeu de 2019 
-  la réactivité peut parfois être légèrement ennuyante (dégainer 3 plombes après le début du combat) 

Et pour ceux/celles qui n'aiment pas faire des allers-retours pour une quête, qui n'aiment pas prendre le temps de dialoguer pour récolter un maximum d'informations, passer votre chemin ! Par ailleurs, c'est un RPG ... il faut bien s'y attendre.  

Cependant, il reste immersif et on se laisse prendre au jeu ... et puis ... toute trilogie ne commence-t-elle pas par le 1e épisode si l'on veut en comprendre l'histoire complète ?   

N'hésitez plus ...

Sans compter que 1,19€ pour 63h de jeu (soit 0.018€ / h) ... 

Bon, allez ... GO pour "The Witcher 2" !!! | 不知道有沒有人遇到和我一樣的問題
雖然將 遊戲從steam內，右鍵>>語言>>中文
進入遊戲卻完全沒字幕
這提供一個解決的方法
我是改回英文
然後在X:\Steam\steamapps\common\The Witcher Enhanced Edition內
找一個「installspcript」的檔案
接著用記事本打開
然後找到幾行
"HKEY_CURRENT_USER\\Software\\CD Projekt RED\\Witcher\\Settings"
{
"string"
{
"english"
{
"TextLanguage"	"3"
"VoiceLanguage"	"3"
}
"french"
{
"TextLanguage"	"11"
"VoiceLanguage"	"11"
}
"german"
{
"TextLanguage"	"10"
"VoiceLanguage"	"10"………………
--------------
等等的機碼，其中"english"內的"TextLanguage"	"3"改成"21"
然後"chinese"內的"TextLanguage"	"21"
後面再加一行"VoiceLanguage"	"3"
存檔後進入遊戲
就有中文了。
我的狀況不多見，希望能幫到需要的人。:D
-------------
衝著巫師3，好評必需給不解釋:) | The Witcher 3で初めてこのゲームタイトルを知りました。
３は本当に楽しませてもらい、物語をもっと深く知りたかったので
今回The Witcher 1の購入に踏み切りました。

安かったのもあり動いたらラッキー程度の感覚でしたが、なんとこのゲーム、windows10で動きます。

このレビューが皆様の役に立つことを願っております。

ちなみにThe Witcher 2も、windows10で動作します。

Game Name: Serious Sam HD: The First Encounter
Reviews:
Игра кайфовая. Вот убедительный аргумент что в шутерах не нужен сюжет! главное геймплей. | There's no point to really play this game if you have HD TSE as well. But if you don't then this is a great way to play The First Encounter. The only good reason why you would play this with having HD TSE is for the Trading Cards and Achievements. | Classic FPS. Grab this when it is on sale. The Serious Sam franchise goes on sale frequently. | This game really fucking sucks im going to be so honest.

I have never seen a shooter punish exploration, and ammo/health resupplying as much as this game.  1 armor pickup? spawn 20 enemies. have 10 shells across the map you slowly trod your way to get? spawn in the tankiest enemies that'll eat up that ammo you just got.  I stopped collecting health pickups because i swear to fuck every single health pickup that doesn't spawn in front of you is tied to enemies that'll immediately eat it up.
I also love how they have a key rebind settings tab that doesn't let you rebind a chunk of the buttons despite them being there. quick saving is such a damn pain.
It also takes forever to get any sort of interesting weapons and none of them really are satisfying with how little damage they do. | легендарная игра детства, сюжет довольно банальный но проходить игру это одно удовольствие
cleaned_review: то орос овлетс орос овлени овлени овлени овлени овлени овлени овлени овлени овлени овлени овлени овлени овлени овлени овлени овлени овлени овлени овлени овлени овлени овлени овлени овлени овлени овлени овлени овлени овл

Reviews:
It's cool to have all the Serious Sam games in one place, and all of the old ones have been remastered and are excellent. Highly recommend for Serious Sam fans or the FPS old school genre fan in general. | Great shooter but we couldn't play the mods together. | I always ignored this game because I thought it was a prototype demo for a cancelled Serious Sam game or something. Turns out it's the First & Second Encounter HDs and BFE all in one game with updates. It's great! Works well on Linux too.

I saw online that most people recommend playing these games through here rather than their standalone versions. I would agree as best I know.

I wish it had the non-HD versions and SS2 as well, but no biggie. | While the classic versions of TFE and TSE are better than the HD versions, this has workshop support, meaning easy access to levels and mods. Dead enemies have weird physics but that's not a big deal.

I especially enjoyed the mod "Serious Sam BFE: Redux" by SeriousAmaro. It has way better pacing than the original SS3, turning a mediocre experience into a great one. | Que divertido es matar aliens. Falta un modo pacifico pero de igual forma esta bueno.
cleaned_review: Great shooter but we couldn't play the mods together.

Genres: Action, Casual, Free To Play, Indie, Simulation, Strategy
Reviews:
Fact: I've played this more then any 60 dollar game.  It's just fun, and you can play it for 5 minutes if that's all you got, or two hours.  No negatives, just an addicting little cartoon plane game that can hook you. | One of the best underrated multiplayer games. And it's ultra low spec.
Best part of this is the football. You got football played with planes and you can't underestimate how good that is. 
5 different planes add some good depth to it. 
If you're a beginner- it's worth finding a football server with bots, and learning how to pass and all that. Also there's a good fun tutorial prepared by altitude. 
Most common server is 14 people, and sometimes the skill level can be quite high. In which case be maybe a bit prepared for some grumpy players especially if you don't know which direction you're going, don't know how to pass, and go for enormous kill counts and neglecting the ball. 
Otherwise, enjoy one of the most underrated multiplayer games on the internet, and which is free as well. | A few years ago I had a lot of fun with this game.  Not sure if it's still alive/active or whatever and I can't exactly find out since my account is just, I don't know, gone?  It's weird.

It was really fun, though.  Like a lot of games that have an overall account level, though, it wasn't the most balanced.  Later upgrades and planes were just, you know, objectively better than starting things.  The ships aren't necessarily rock-paper-scissors in design but there are elements like that to them.  Having said that, the starting ship is probably the best one, which is good for beginners.

Regardless, the ships were balanced enough that you could play whatever and probably be fine in most situations.  The game modes were varied enough.  You had death match and team death match, yeah, but there was also a mode where you destroyed an enemy base, and another where you effectively played soccor with the space ships.  I really liked the last one, but they were all fun and I'd play whatever when I did.

Controls were fine, graphics were fine, sounds were fine.  The only problem I ever encountered were some latency issues, where people would just appear to teleport somewhere else or where you were clearly disconnecting (everyone was falling or flying into walls).

Yeah, every now and then I boot this up and try to figure out my old account, or to make my old account work, but it never happens.  Had a lot of good times and I would totally play some more, if not a lot, should I ever fix that.  Good game, if you see it on sale, do check it out.  Assuming it's still alive.  It might not be!

The edit: game is mostly dead except for old elitists, apparently.  Shame.  Guess they are a pretty closed off community and not friendly to newbs.  Oh well.  RIP altitude. | A few years back, this game was great. It had a small community but enough to make the game worth playing. As of now there's probably only a few dozen people playing.

I wouldn't recommend purchasing it now unless it's extremely cheap and you're curious, but during its active lifespan it was a great game.

8/10 | Skill, adresse et reflexe, un concentré du meilleur dans un petit jeux. Même ma femme y joue !

Addictif et sans prétention.
cleaned_review: 'Football' is a great game, but it's not the best.

Game Name: LEGO® Star Wars™ - The Complete Saga
Reviews:
This is unequivocally the best Lego game ever made. 
The combat and graphics in this game are detailed
and makes the game one to revisit for years to come
10/10 game | The first real game I ever played was LEGO® Star Wars™ - The Complete Saga, excluding Flash games. Honestly, it's a masterpiece in every way. The comedy, charm, and creativity make this an unforgettable experience. Also, after playing LEGO® Star Wars™: The Skywalker Saga, I found it surprising that you cannot design your own Jedi or Sith even though it is a newer game. Instead, you're trapped with a predetermined cast of characters. However, in The Complete Saga, you can create your own personalized characters by mixing and matching pieces as desired. That increased freedom is why The Complete Saga is the GOAT. It allows you to actually play out your own Star Wars experience in a way that the newer game just doesn’t. 10/10 | It's all a bit old, and the multiplayer isn't properly implemented for that, but it's a classic for a reason. Solid entertainment with lots of fun bits to explore. | Could be on a top 10 list for the greatest video games of all time. Perhaps is the greatest LEGO video game of all time. Not many games can stand the test of time like this one has, with a near perfect reception record. Thank you for this beautiful gift you have so graciously given us, developers. | Lego Star Wars the Complete Saga is The GOAT of Lego games.  All other opinions are wrong!  Thank you and have a good day.
cleaned_review: The Complete Saga is a classic, and it's a masterpiece.

Game Name: Fallout 3: Game of the Year Edition
Reviews:
This review is for the steam version of the game. Currently, the game is literally unplayable. Upon starting a new game, the loading screen runs for a second, and then the application crashes. I have tried two settings changes and a mod, the only recommendations I could find online, and I still can not play my game. This is not a problem that only I am having. Look online. There are hundreds of people reporting this exact issue. | 作为B社接手后的第一款辐射，对辐射系列的后续影响是巨大的，辐射3的玩法中规中矩，但主线支线以及DLC的设计还是相当有特点的，该有的大场面也都有，尤其是101小子自我牺牲启动净水工程时的结尾，继承了父母的遗志的，吾乃阿尔法，亦为奥米伽，吾乃开始，亦为终结。吾将生命之泉，白白赐予口渴之众。我真的相当喜欢！ | Perhaps the most impressive aspect of Fallout 3 is how effortlessly it combines so many gameplay mechanics, storylines, characters, expansive environments and complex in-game intricacies into one fluid package. It offers freedom without sacrificing a focused story. It delivers fantastic combat without forgoing a deep role-playing system.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3424839441

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3424840194 | Some would say that Fallout 3 is a failure, the worst game in the franchise, why do they say that? Hell if I know. This is a wonderful game and has the same kind of charm as Fallout New Vegas, minus a few gameplay addons and PLUS a whole lot of fun. This game pioneers a "whacky" theme to fallout opposed to a highly immersive one. | I originally played this game + all DLCs on the Xbox 360 near its release. It is a classic open world game that you should play at least once in your lifetime. I personally prefer it over New Vegas but mainly due to nostalgia. A negative: on PC it runs slightly worse optimization wise.

one of the best games I could possibly recommend for low end computers. incredible gameplay and great story | Game is automatically incredible because of the parachute and grappling hook mechanic. | Tried this game several times over the years and hallelujah it finally clicked. Had a handful of crashes and a few freezes, but this game definitely holds up and is completely addicting. After 71 hours for 75% I feel like I'm just starting to get good at the controls. 10/10 am playing again on hardest difficulty. | [h1]This game is a gift that keeps on giving.[/h1] 

Even if you don't feel like playing through the story, much like GTA, you can mess about around the map. One of my favourite things to do is using the grappling hook to string people up from the street lights. You can drive around the map and take in the beautiful scenery (or fly if you feel like it), and you can [b]just cause[/b] mayhem! | Etrafta uçup kaçıp kaos yaratmak. Oyun bundan fazlasını vaat ediyor ama o fazlası olan her şey 2010 senesi için bile çok dandik. 

Hikayede Rico ve ekibi helikopter ile Güneydoğu Asya'da bulunan rastgele bir diktatörlüğe amerikan emriyle demokrasi dağıtmaya gelir. Rico adaya varmak üzereyken bu adanın artık düşman bir hükümete sahip olduğunu öğrenir. Hemen sonrasında klasik helikoptere saldırı olur. Sonra da niyeyse Amerikan hükümeti ile alakalı çok önemli dosyaları helikopterde düşman topraklarına götürüyormuşuz ve onlar düşüp etrafa saçılır. Bu tarz başlayan ve bir kaka fırtınası olarak devam eden hikayeyi takmadığımız sürece kafamız rahat ediyor.

Neyse ki grappling hook ve onunla yapabileceklerimiz devreye girince özellikle dönemi için inanılmaz eğlenceli bir kaos yaratma serüveni başlıyor. Gameplay olarak düşmanlar ve gun play yine senesi için kötünün iyisi denebilir. Ki zaten çoğunlukla koşu silahla milleti taramak yerine etrafta uçup kaçıp bombalar fırlatıp her yeri patlatıyoruz şeklinde bir oynanışa sahibiz.

Steam versiyonu bozuk diyenler çok ki 30dk içerisinde bir kere çöktü ve bir kere de dört senelik pc'de ilk defa mavi ekrana sebep oldu steam versiyonuna özel mi bilmiyorum ama teknik olarak çok problemli olduğu kesin şu anki halinin. 

2024 yılında girince tabii o kadar ilginç gelmiyor oyun ama o dönem neler yapılıyormuş diye merak eder ve serinin üçüncü oyunu dışında güzel hangi oyunu var derseniz kesinlikle buna bakın derim.

Достойна гра серії. Трошки замала і закоротка в порівнянні з іншими, але цілком на рівні Сталкера. Атмосфера, ембіент як завжди на висоті. Сюжет трошки слабший ніж в інших іграх серії, але зовсім не поганий, просто не шедевральний :)
Також мені сподобались деякі нововведення. Наприклад, аптечки лікують не миттєво, а поступово, тому не вийде залетіти в групу ворогів тицяючи [ ] :)
Гра займає почесне 4 місце в мому рейтингу Сталкерів :) | By far, the most polished of the three original STALKER games. Best graphics, least bugs, best UI. The story is easier to follow and you can actually understand where you have to go and what you have to do. The authentic STALKER atmosphere is untouched. | This is the game that I enjoyed the most among the original stalker trilogy.  Combat feels fluid and the in game economy is well balanced. The story itself is quite interesting, especially the side quests. The underlying story in the side quests allows the player to interact with the world on a deeper level compared to some fetch stuff or kill mutants quests. It all boils down to say that the best features from the two previous games were perfected here.  I had a lot of fun palying this game. | O jogo é muito divertido, o mais polido dos 3 primeiros, até o momento por enquanto (12h de gameplay) c vc curte a estética desse tipo de game recomendo d+ | Easily the best out of the original 3 games. I enjoyed the protagonist and his main objective, along with how straightforward the various locations were presented and used. My favorite part of the game were the side quests, the characters introduced within them, and the unique rewards granted upon their various completions.

[h1]Легендарна пісочниця[/h1]

Ви коли-небудь хотіли пограти щось в епоху чистого, я маю на увазі без магічних штук, середньовіччя? Якщо так, то ця гра саме те, що потрібно. Тут є досить великий відкритий світ, гра не заганяє в рамки, ви можете робити все що спаде на думку і бути будь-ким: розбійником, найманцем, торговцем, лордом або кинути виклик усім і стати володарем власного королівства, а згодом і королем усієї Кальрадії. З часом гра починає набридати, тоді на сцену виходять модифікації, це є ще одним великим плюсом. У вас є можливість перетворити гру на будь-що, від сонячного "Дикого заходу" і моторошних земель "Володаря перснів", до космічних просторів із всесвіту "Зоряних війн".

Ця гра сильно затягує, тому якщо вона вам сподобається, то з великою ймовірністю у перші дні буде награно кілька десятків годин. Серйозно, мені було важко з неї вийти, постійно в голові складав план, наприклад, ось завершу цей квест і виходжу, а в цей момент на карті з'являлися кілька лутерів і я такий "перемагаю їх і на сьогодні досить", але потім все затяглося на кшталт зроблю це, зроблю то, продам то, знищу тих, бах і замок в осаді... Дивлюся, а надворі вже ніч і треба лягати спати. Спочатку я взагалі думав зайти побігати трохи, зробити кілька знятків і вийти. І я набігав аж 130 годин за кілька тижнів.

Дивлячись на негативні рецензії, то 75% з них є просто через те, що існує M&B Warband, як на мене це не зовсім справедливо, але я розумію їх, він дійсно краще, як з технічного стану так і візуально, і так, я [b]РЕКОМЕНДУЮ[/b] починати з Warband, але не слід забувати, що оригінальний M&B це по суті його фундамент і обзивати його лохом через те, що у нього є менший брат, який набагато кращий у всьому, я не можу.

Українізатора для M&B на жаль немає, але в цій ситуації я не впевнений, чи він взагалі потрібен, як я писав вище, краще починати з Warband, Українізатор для якого є.

[h1]7 полонених королів з 10[/h1] | Mount & Blade – це унікальна серія, яка втілює мрію кожного гравця про свободу у відкритому середньовічному світі. Розроблена турецькою студією TaleWorlds Entertainment, гра стала справжнім подарунком для любителів стратегій, ролевих ігор та епічних битв. Незважаючи на відсутність глянцю великих ААА-проєктів, Mount & Blade захоплює своєю глибиною та неповторним шармом.

Свобода вибору
Однією з найбільших переваг Mount & Blade є повна свобода дій. Ви починаєте як невідомий мандрівник і можете стати ким завгодно: найманцем, торговцем, лордом чи навіть королем власного королівства. Гравець має змогу самостійно вирішувати, як писати свою історію в світі Калрадії – фентезійного середньовічного континенту, наповненого політичними інтригами, війнами та нескінченними можливостями.

Бойова система
Mount & Blade відома своєю реалістичною та динамічною бойовою системою. Битви відбуваються в реальному часі, і від вашої майстерності залежить результат кожного поєдинку. Можливість брати участь у масштабних битвах, керувати загоном чи навіть стати героєм, який змінить хід війни, дарує незабутні враження. Ви відчуєте всю вагу меча, точність стріл і потужність кавалерійської атаки.

Стратегічні елементи
Крім бойових аспектів, Mount & Blade пропонує широкий спектр стратегічних можливостей. Ви можете формувати власну армію, керувати ресурсами, будувати економічні ланцюжки та укладати дипломатичні угоди. Захоплення міст і замків, боротьба за політичний вплив та управління підданими додають глибини ігровому процесу.

Атмосфера та світ
Калрадія – це світ, сповнений життя, історій і конфліктів. Різні фракції, культури та політичні амбіції створюють динамічне середовище, де кожна дія гравця впливає на подальший розвиток подій. Атмосфера середньовіччя відчувається у всьому: від музичного супроводу до деталей одягу та архітектури.

Особливості серії
Mount & Blade: Warband – вершина класичної серії, яка додала мультиплеєр і розширила можливості для створення власного королівства.
Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord – довгоочікуване продовження, яке зберегло дух оригіналу, але вивело графіку, механіку та масштабність гри на новий рівень.
Графіка та технічні аспекти
Хоча графіка Mount & Blade не є найсильнішою стороною серії, це з лишком компенсується глибоким геймплеєм і багатством можливостей. Своєрідна естетика додає шарму та допомагає зосередитися на головному – на грі.

Модифікації – душа Mount & Blade
Окремої уваги заслуговують моди. Спільнота фанатів створила величезну кількість модифікацій, які додають нові фракції, епохи та навіть змінюють сеттинг гри. Хочете опинитися у Середзем’ї з "Володаря перснів" чи перенестися у світ вікінгів? Завдяки модам це можливо.

Загальне враження
Mount & Blade – це гра, яка дає вам більше, ніж ви очікуєте. Вона не хапає зірок із неба у графіці чи постановці, але її глибина, свобода та реалістичність роблять її однією з найкращих у своєму жанрі. Це проєкт для тих, хто любить виклики, стратегії та хоче творити власну історію у світі середньовіччя.

Оцінка: 9/10
Mount & Blade – це гра для душі, яка вимагає часу, але нагороджує незабутніми враженнями. | ilk m&b.

This game is old, and it shows but it is slightly better than it appears. I nearly gave up due the poor control but with changing the camera behind the character, it was playable. The game initially bombed out at the start, but changing the config as suggested by others made it work for me. 

I even said I was having fun when I got to bash up the bully - three times! Voice acting is great even though the speech was a bit slow than ideal. The initial positive impression soon turned negative however. I got frustrated with the unwieldy UI - for example, in the cauldron mission where you need to cool boiling cauldrons, you will have to open up the Inventory and click on the quest item to cool. The inventory screen would not stay open and cauldrons exploded as I tried to keep having to open up the screen and mouse-click the item. You cannot create a short-cut to the quest item,  but why not? The second issue is that enemies are damage-sponge even at the easy level - which makes the game excessively long although not necessarily hard. 

With some refinements, this game could have been great, but it is currently something I couldn't recommend for modern audiences. Save your money and play something else. | 小时候在路边摊买的盘。。 | Ностальгия школьных времён. | Mi juego favorito de la infancia | .

Reviews:
Uma serie épica !!!

Felizmente, Metro Redux consegue se diferenciar nesse sentido ao trazer ao mercado um valor de produção muito grande, ao mesmo tempo em que resgata experiências já um tanto quanto antigas. Usando a versão mais recente da 4A Engine, o pacote permite reviver as experiências de Metro 2033 e Metro Last Light com gráficos revitalizados e com uma jogabilidade mais refinada do que a vista nas versões originais.

Tivemos a oportunidade de conferir a remasterização na íntegra e, nesta análise, trazemos tudo aquilo que você precisa saber sobre ela. Além disso, aproveitamos para retornar aos lançamentos originais para conferir o quanto elas se diferenciam do novo trabalho feito pela 4A Games.


Um novo fôlego para a franquia:

A principal novidade de Metro Redux fica por conta do uso da versão mais recente da 4ª Engine, que já se mostra bem adaptada aos requisitos da nova geração de consoles. Na prática, isso se reflete em modelos tridimensionais com uma qualidade melhor, em um novo sistema de iluminação e em texturas com um nível maior de detalhes.

O maior beneficiado pelo novo motor gráfico é Metro 2033, lançado no já distante ano de 2010. Embora o game ainda possa ser considerado belo (especialmente no PC), o trabalho feito pelos desenvolvedores conseguiu trazer a ele um novo nível de qualidade — o que deve ajudar a justificar o retorno daqueles que já conferiram a versão original.

Além de adotar modelos de personagens com uma qualidade maior de detalhes, o game ganha texturas em alta resolução que permitem apreciar melhor a direção de arte da 4A Games. O título também traz monstros com um visual aprimorado e diversas adições às suas animações, o que garante uma maior naturalidade de movimentos tanto para personagens humanos quanto para as criaturas mutantes que você deve enfrentar.

Metro 2033 também ganhou algumas atualizações em suas mecânicas de jogo, adotando um sistema de controles idêntico àquele visto na sequência Last Light. Outro ponto que mostra a dedicação dos desenvolvedores a realmente fazer um trabalho de qualidade são as cenas de corte do jogo, que agora são reproduzidas exclusivamente em primeira pessoa — com direito a diversos momentos interativos.


Experiência que se sustenta:

O ponto que mais se destaca no conteúdo visto em Metro Redux é a maneira como a franquia continua parecendo “fresca”, mesmo que seu primeiro capítulo tenha sido lançado há quase meia década. Muito disso se deve à ambientação explorada pela 4A Games, que se assemelha muito mais a um game do gênero Survival Horror do que a um FPS convencional.

Talvez ciente de que nem todos os jogadores podem se interessar por um título com certas restrições, o estúdio decidiu criar dois estilos de jogabilidade: Survival e Spartan. Enquanto o primeiro reduz a quantidade de munições e armamentos que você encontra (o que torna a experiência mais assustadora), o segundo age como um “jogo de tiro convencional”, permitindo que você seja mais descuidado durante os combates.

Independente da opção que você escolher, a experiência básica de ambos os jogos se mantém impressionantemente sólida. Grande parte disso se deve à presença de adversários com uma boa inteligência artificial (que sofreu aprimoramentos notáveis na versão Redux, especialmente em Metro 2033) e também à maneira como os combates são construídos.


Vale a pena? Muito bom mesmo vale muito a pena !!!

Devemos ser bem sinceros: caso você já tenha finalizado Metro 2033 e Metro Last Light, a aquisição de Metro Redux não é exatamente necessária — afinal, por maiores que sejam as melhorias apresentadas, em essência os jogos permanecem idênticos. No entanto, quem não pôde conferir as experiências em sua época de lançamento (ou simplesmente quer revivê-las) não poderia pedir muito mais da remasterização.

Nesse sentido, surge como vantagem a possibilidade de poder adquirir as duas versões Redux de forma individual através do meio digital. Dessa maneira, você pode escolher somente o título que mais lhe interessa, deixando de lado aquele com qual já tem mais familiaridade — algo que, devemos admitir, deve prejudicar um pouco as vendas de Last Light em sua versão para PC.

Caso você simplesmente nunca tenha entrado no universo de Metro, essa é a melhor opção para conhecer o universo da franquia. Metro: Redux é a versão definitiva dos dois títulos da série e seu grande nível de qualidade deixa uma boa perspectiva do que podemos esperar para os trabalhos futuros do estúdio 4A Games.


Pros:

* Jogabilidade renovada ajuda a atualizar Metro 2033
* Nova engine contribui para tornar os títulos ainda mais bonitos
* Modos de jogo agradam tanto aos fãs do terror quanto a quem gosta de jogos de tiro mais tradicionais


Contras:

* Alguns bugs do passado permanecem incomodando | Игра хорошо набирает оборот. Слаба в геймплее но интересна на ощущениях. Типа остановиться сложно играя, но в общем формате - надоест. Плюс уровень, который стоял Рэйджер изи - довольно противный уровень, поэтому играйте на среднем. Ах да, концовка, оказывается, что тебе нужно каждый куст посмотреть - идиотизм. Даже на своё время - это тупое решение. Оценка 6.5/10 | epic sztori és élmény
 | this a cheeseburger game | ну скоро пригодится)

Reviews:
A fun little point'n'click. Clearly heavily inspired by Monkey Island, but that's no bad thing.

One annoying technical quirk is an improper aspect ratio if playing full-screen on a modern 16:9 monitor. So your options are playing in a 800x600 window, or messing with your display settings. Other than that it ran perfectly on a modern Windows 11 system.

Seasoned adventure game players are likely to find the puzzles a touch easy. I finished the game in around 4 hours without using the hint system. Some of the puzzles were similar to those found in Monkey Island and, weirdly, Loom, so that probably helped me along. But I never found the puzzles to be unsatisfying or wholly unoriginal.

The story is a little cookie-cutter, but there are a few fun twists and turns. The main character is very likeable, honestly a rarity in comedic point'n'clicks. Good art and voice-acting.

Overall, well worth dropping a few quid on. 👍
cleaned_review: A fun point'n'click game.

Reviews:
SimCity 4 is arguably one of, if not the best city builder games out there. It is unmatched in quite a few ways.

In terms of graphics,, it's timeless. i'm amazed how well the visuals have held up over the years. I think the realism mixed with a distinct art-style is what does it. The not quite isometric camera angle and 3D assets go a long way as well.

Game-play and simulation is what really make SimCity 4 stand out though. You're not just zoning a bunch of RCI and watching all the money roll in. You actually have to be careful and manage your funds or else things will go south quickly. Yet at the same time, it's extremely rewarding to see your city succeed.

You're also provided with a plethora of ways to keep track of what's going on in your city. Not only do you have advisors and graphs; but you also can also turn on a bunch of different overlays to look for pollution, traffic, crime, etc. One of my favourite features though is the query tool. With this you can check how and where residents commute on top of other things.

With Residential and Commercial; not only can you choose 3 different density levels, but you can quite easily control the wealth too. There's also 4 different types of industrial (Farms, Dirty, Manufacturing, and High-Tech) with 2 density levels for all except farms.

I could go on and on about how great this SimCity 4 is but there's just so much. That's not to say it doesn't have flaws though. Vanilla traffic path finding is pretty bad, there are some game breaking bugs, and it just does not like modern computers very much. Fortunately most of this can be fixed with mods and some tinkering.

In the end i'd highly recommend this SimCity 4 to anyone who enjoys city building games. | The best city building game ever made. Runs surprisingly well on modern PCs too. For 2003 this shit was super ahead of its time, Im still waiting for someone to make a city builder that allows you to adjust peoples taxes based on their income. | Este juego es uno de los mejores clásicos en el género de Construcción y Gestión, pues si bien ya tiene 2 décadas desde que se lanzó en 2003, se nota que. Por ejemplo, podemos construir una región entera y gestionarla; terraformar terrenos cuando todavía no inaguramos una ciudad con el objetivo de, entre otras cosas preparar y proyectar qué tan plano debería ser para recibir una cierta cantidad de habitantes; hacer mapas personalizados de hasta 128 kilómetros de lado, equivalente a un poco más de una quinta parte del largo de la Provincia de Santiago del Estero, que serían 540 kilómetros, entre otros. | O jogo é muito divertido, e se você se dedicar a entender a dinâmica do jogo, você vai conseguir se divertir bastante nele! | Classic pc game. I have to reinstall right now to try and fix a crashing issue. Could just be my ancient pc. Super fun game!
cleaned_review: SimCity 4 is arguably one of, if not the best city builder games out there. It is unmatched in quite a few ways. In terms of graphics, it's timeless. I'm amazed how well the visuals have held up over the years. I think the realism mixed with a distinct art-style is what does it.

 | Releasing an update that stops the game from even running is anti-consumer and all potential buyers should avoid games by Firaxis games studio and it's related partners in the future. This likely includes all future civilization games, but i'm not a wizard so I cannot say for certain if another studio might take up new entries in this particular series.

Furthermore steam should be making more of an effort to punish games studios who do this. I am very disappointed in Steam for even allowing this to occur.

Users should not be forced on to the forums to find some fix posted by a third party from another website and dig into the game files just to make it function.

This is clear and obvious trick to force people to play newer titles and should be punished accordingly. | Amazing game and out right fun with friends regardless of what happens. Why don't I recommend the game? I am unable to even launch the game anymore and have tried hundreds of hours to try fixing it. It's unplayable and the support I've reached out to either ignores me or says it's steam's issue for the game not working and steam won't take any form of help when requests are made to them. This is a great example why you shouldn't throw in extra connections or third party connections etc. One thing is removed and it's all broke.What's worse? They're still trying to sell the game despite KNOWING it's unplayable. They KNOW it's unplayable and still choose to sell it. A, at this time, $29.99 game that is NOT ABLE TO BE STARTED. 

When the game is fixed the review will be changed obviously but until then I can not recommend the game to anyone. I do not reccomend buying this gaming NFT.
cleaned_review: I am very disappointed in Steam for even allowing this to occur. Users should not be forced on to the forums to find some fix posted by a third party from another website and dig into the game files just to make it function. This is clear and obvious trick to force people to play newer titles and should be punished accordingly. | Amazing game and out right fun with friends regardless of what happens. Reviews:
An unexpected joy. Who knew capitalism became palatable when you can literally seize the means of production. I found the narrative charming and often hilariously meta, the dungeons fun in their complexity arising from a bunch of seemingly simple pieces, and the shop dynamics an interesting counterpart thereto. It's a challenge without being punishing, and the loops are all snappy, punchy fun. | The true godfather of the "Running your own shop" simulator style games, going out on adventures to find things to sell or just buying products to mark them up at a premium. I've actually done an entire playthrough of finishing the game where I didnt go out to adventure at all, i'd just buy products from stores or from customers looking to sell and then sell them at a premium. Its criminal that this game has no true sequel all these years later as the game which influenced a genre

Capitalism, Ho! 
Pay off that debt!
 | A must-play for fans of simulation and light RPGs!
A charming and innovative indie game that combines shop management with dungeon crawling, offering a unique twist on traditional RPG mechanics. Extremely fun and highly recommended. | Um joguinho muito bom, roda em qualquer pc, tem aventura em dungeons retrata bem os jogos da época, jogo muito divertido que me roubou muitas horas.
Se você quiser zerar ele completamente vai roubar um pouco mais. 
Fácil de vencer os inimigos com varias opções de classes diferentes para jogar nas dungeons.
Espere uma promoção, mas que valeu a pena o jogo eu não tenho dúvida.
Depois de terminar o prazo estabelecido pela fada, tem muito mais do jogo a ser explorado o que deixa o jogo mais legal, além das histórias seguintes quando se avança pelas dugeons e encontra novos personagens. | Lovely game, style & charm galore...but...golly god. That midi-trumpet store tune almost made me blow a gasket
