Reviews:
The Room is a puzzle game where you solve a series of intricate puzzle boxes to uncover the secret of A.S., the person who called you to solve them.

The gameplay here is pretty simple: you just solve puzzles. Each stage, you're given one puzzle box, and you have to click around to figure out how each part opens or moves. The puzzles weren't very difficult. The only times I got a little bit stuck were because it wasn't clear that something was movable. There were a few puzzle types that were repeated once or twice, but it didn't happen enough to bore me by the end. 

The Room doesn't have a very developed story, but it is very atmospheric. What story you get comes in the form of notes from A.S., which give you some insight into what they were researching. The game has a mysterious vibe to it that gets creepier as you get further into the levels, from the increasing strangeness of the notes, the changing details of the room around you, and the odd noises mixed in with the background music.

This game was originally a mobile game and the movements you have to make were clearly designed with a touch interface in mind. You have to turn keys and cranks and pull up on lids. You also have to move the camera around to see the puzzle boxes from all sides or to line elements up a certain way for some of the puzzles. I played on a computer with a mouse, so some of those movements felt a little awkward. It was also a little annoying to have to adjust the camera so much to see certain things straight on.

Overall, I liked The Room. While the puzzles weren't difficult, I wasn't bored with them, and I enjoyed the creepy atmosphere. Although it was a bit short, I felt like I got a decent value out of the game, and I'm really curious to see what the rest of the series will have to offer. 7/10 | This is one of if not my favourite puzzle game. It's not too long and that is a huge plus. It knows it doesn't need two houndred hours of content to be good and it shows how much dedication they have put in the game with the few hours of pure quality in it | Fun game that can be challenging, but still add depth without feeling stymied! | An excellent puzzle game in concept and execution. Would love to see many more like it. If you love real life puzzle boxes and mechanical puzzles this can scratch that kind of itch with things taken to the somewhat movie style fantastical with what is possible but fitting for something you can suspend disbelief for and enjoy. | If you enjoy a challenging point and click puzzle game with an impressive amount of lore and backstory, i would highly recommend this. Fun, eerie, and challenging, The Room will have you enthralled and enraptured with its narrative
cleaned_review: The Room is a puzzle game that is a bit slow at times, but it's still fun.

Reviews:
Con los King's Bounty de Katauri Interactive pasa un poco como con los Yakuza: son todos prácticamente idénticos, duran en torno a 100 horas, y si te gusta uno, lo más probable es que te gusten todos. Este, Dark Side, tiene la particularidad de que en lugar de controlar a los buenos llevas a los malos del cuento. Pero es un gimmick que cambia muy poquito el desarrollo o la mecánica del juego. Más allá de llevar a un vampiro, un orco o una demonia, Dark Side ofrece exactamente lo mismo que el resto de los títulos de la saga. Y eso no es malo. Para mí, que soy adicto a esta droga, es estupendo. Pero al mismo tiempo soy plenamente consciente de estar enchufándome un entretenimiento completamente vacuo y entumecedor, que rasca un rinconcito muy específico de mi cerebro. | Поставил сложный уровень сложности - тебя развалил гном перед вратами. Поставил нормальный уровень сложности -  тебя снова развалил гном перед вратами. Поставил лёгкий уровень сложности - всё верно, тебя всё ещё развалил гном перед вратами. Очень интересная игра, 10 развалов из 10. | Да, посоветую тем у кого много свободного времени. | Ладно, ладно.... Игру я всё же прошёл...

Наверное самая слабая часть из всей серии. Хотя будь она любительским модом - вопросов было бы меньше, а так всё же полноценный официальный спинофф. 
Да, кстати те 3 боя в самом начале из-за которых я хотел дропать игру - самые сложные. Если пройдёте их (речь, конечно же про воина), то остальную игру пролетите одной левой. Оказалось супер просто и даже скучно. 

Что же с игрой не так? Да почти всё не так. 
Да, в базе это та самая кингс баунти, да, на бумаге очень оригинальная идея, да самостоятельная, независимая часть, но как же всё в реализации откровенно слабо. 
Про баланс уже написал в самом начале, стоит добавить, что вся игра сводится к таланту 15% на половину отряда врага. Вражеские отряды буквально имеют тысячные кол-во, срубать это эффективно только проками с аое или дотами. А всё остальное время нужно просто бадиблочить вражеских стрелков. Всё, это схема боя на 99% сражений. 
Враги буквально надоедают однотипностью. Я думал задушусь убивать нежить в ВС, но на деле я задушился в ТС на эльфах, учитывая эти неадекватные цифры в армиях и абсолютно 1 в 1 тактику боя. 
Шкатулка (так я называю механику ярости, в этой же части это Черныш) просто бесполезный мусор. Вроде и дают талант на 90% откат в 1м раунде и можно кастовать по 5-6 раз, но на деле все абилки на дамаг будут врагу как по женскому детородному органу ладошкой. (2-4к урона по армии из 1к+ рыцарей). Эффективными будут только 2 скила на процент урона и тотем девицы, его я называю тотемом суеты. Всё остальное - чисто от скуки, ну или щит неплохой выдать. 
Так же куда-то пропали часть юнитов из ВС, при этом новых особо не завезли, а тех что завезли - достанешь дай бог под конец. Где снежные эльфы? Где 2 вида злобоглазов? Даже циклопов видел только у врагов. В целом в игре мало магазинов, в которых должно что-то рандомиться. Из-за этого сложно найти нужные вещи и юнитов. Типа идея в том, что можно закупать и развивать всё в хабе, но нет, далеко не всё. 
Так же в игре нельзя играть за светлых. В игре будет их аналог 1 в 1, но называться они будут тёмными, иметь затемнённый вид и открываются только после захвата острова. А ещё они ограничены и порой даже остро. 
Отдельный камень в огород, а лучше сразу по руками тому гению, кто решил убрать у диспела возможность снимать доты. При этом добавил новую. Единсвтенное назначение скилла и то убрали. Зачем? Кто просил? Надеюсь этот человек больше не балансит игры. 

Сюжет. Как уже говорилось: на бумаге неплохо, но реаализации совсем плохо. В целом игра проходима, есть неплохие, даже забавные текста, персонажи, но всё прохождение сводится к одной и той же схеме: найди злых союзников, перебей всех добрых. Всё, так до конца игры, повторить почти на каждом обязательном острове. Да, есть там неплохие моменты, но их как капля мёда в бочке. 
Общая часть диалогов написано пресно и, что ещё хуже, в бесконечных пасхалках и отсылках, даже иногда с разрушением 4й стены. Это прикольно раз-два, но не когда у вас это в каждом 3м диалоге. 
Завезли, кстати, новые иконки персонажей, этого не хватало после ВС, где видишь в 3й раз те же самые лица но с другими ролями. Только вот тоже моментик: все они отфотошопленные лица разных людей, в том числе знаменитостей. Выпустили бы это сейчас - все бы говорили, что какая-то хреновая нейросеть. Халтура? Халтура. 

Отдельная очень важная инфа про квесты. Хотя много кто уже это отметил, но в них нет нормального описания. Если ты не прочитал в 1й раз его в диалоге с персонажем, то иди потом сам делай что хочешь и ищи где хочешь. В журнале толком ничего не будет. Я понимаю, что к тому моменту уже вышло 2 части дарк соулс, и людям, которые любят квесты в дарк соулс такой стиль зашёл бы, но будем честны, НИКТО НЕ ЛЮБИТ ДЕЛАТЬ КВЕСТЫ В ДАРК СОУЛС. И никто не делает их самостоятельно. Только вот в отличии от дарк соулса у КБ нет вики с подробным описанием что и куда (есть обычная, но там информации никакой нет), поэтому приходилось играть в 2м окне с прохождением, и если начинался затуп (читать всегда) или возвращаешься к старому квесту - читаешь его. Лучше способа нарушить атмосферу игры не придумать. 
Ещё пару камней в квесты у игры: Они могут иметь свою последовательность и квесты на трату золота или привести тип армии. Вот последних очень много и они некоторые не дают ничего. Просто ничего, абсолютно. Особенно весело в начале игры искать по 30к, 100к, что бы пройти ОСНОВНОЙ СЮЖЕТ. Это такой бред, благо под конец игры с деньгами проблем нет, но в начале это заставляет думать куда идти пофармить. 
Баги. В игре их немного, и игра спокойно проходится. В отличии от ВС она почти не вылетает(но всё же вылетает), но есть свои неприятности. Например что-то где-то не подбирается. Какая-то последовательность квестов не работает, юниты застревают, ландшафт с кривыми мостами, на которых постоянно застреваешь и вот такие мелочи. Звук у амазонок например, эта азбука морзе... Пришлось удалять их звуковые эффекты. Так же на них не работает баф на урон от луков. Они же с луками, в чём проблема? Но увы, не работает. С звуком, кстати, в игре вообще отдельная проблема. На пиратском острове например играет один и тот же трек, с которого в дурку уедешь через 10 минут. Пришлось лезть в файл Плейлист и самому всё настраивать. А в конце мне даже не дали ачивку за бой без книги магии. Я её не трогал, но ачивку не получил. Обидно. 

Но всё же, хоть это и слабейшая часть, я её всё же рекомендую для тех, как и я, кто после 3х частей хочет ещё. Кто не наигрался в этот прекрасный, фентезийный мир. Кто не накидался скилами и не начитался диалогов. Да, тут это всё слабее, вайб упущен сильно, но это и поможет конкретно "наиграться" в КБ. 
К сожалению тот самый мощный вайб из ЛоР, когда у тебя там всего 2-3 лучника, пара мечников и ты дерёшься с растениями, дракончиками, волками, потом становишься сильнее, идёшь драться уже с нежитью и так по нарастающий, пока не заканчиваешь победой над злыми демонами и драконами с огромной армией - вот этот мощнейший вайб настоящей фентезии истории... им тут даже не пахнет. Он в целом начинал теряться ещё в ПвД, чуть вернулся в ВС и полностью домирает в ТС. 
Поэтому дополнительно, т.к. это последняя часть сделаю так же небольшую оценку всех 4х частей. 
Примерно так:
ЛоР>ПвД>ВС>ТС 
(Если бы ВС не имело жестких тех проблем с вылетами, то был бы лучше ПвД, но увы)
Очень бы хотелось, что бы вот была игра как ЛоР по вайбу, но геймплейные фишки были из всех частей и что бы игра часов на 200. Вот это была бы пушка. Возможно такой должна была бы стать КБ 2, но увы, там совсем другая игра, которую ещё придётся пройти. Ну а с этой серии пока закончили, все части стоит пройти, даже эту, самую слабую.  | Fajna gierka, jak lubicie latać tam i spowrotem jak kurier Telepizzy, bo jakis zjeb podrzucił włos do pizzy. Pobugowane w chuj, ale nie tak jak klient Lola.

Reviews:
When it comes to Duelyst, the comparison with Hearthstone is easily made. The way you earn cards is the same, the ranked system is the same, the mana system is the same and the way classes work is the same, complete with special power.

However, there's a few very key differences between the two games that make Duelyst less random and, to me at least, more fun: The board on which you play as well as the ability to replace a card from your hand once per turn.

The board in combination with the various cards makes for some really deep and satisfying tactical play that allows you to bend the game to your favour with smart decisions. Every turn the board looks different as there's so much going on and every turn has a very large amount of decisions that you can make. I really enjoy this the most as a fervent tactical turn-based gamer. If you like the combat in XCOM and Age of Wonders 3, you will find lots to love here.

Other plusses are the quick matchmaking, the active developers, the gorgeous pixel art and animations and the large amount of interesting lore.

I am personally not a fan of random stuff (which is why I stopped playing Hearthstone) and to me Duelyst strikes the perfect balance between randomness and tactics. Highly recommended! | Abosultely love this game! The strategy needed due to the infinite possibilities between the game board, placement of "cards", and of course the kick @$$ pixel graphics!!  A very satisfying game that could easily be played and enjoyed without spending a penny of "real money".  The daily quests (and free card) can get you enough gold to buy spirit orbs (card packs), gauntlet tickets (arena/draft play) and bloodborn orbs (card packs with cards you DONT have!).  Yes, if you get a crate you need a key to open it which costs $4.99.. BUT they did recently implement a "common crate" key reward for 15 quests completed in a month (easy).  However, if you are worried that you will be missing out on items due to not wanting to buy crates they are mostly filled with cosmetic items with 1 card here and there so they are not required to complete your card collection. The last thing I want to touch on, which is one of my favorites, is the fact that each "faction" or class does not only have 1 type of general that has the same hero power no matter the skin or avatar.  There are multiple general (main hero/"face") options for each faction AND your general always has at least 2 attack and can  move around the board like a chess piece, the same as your minions, instead of just being your avatar with a set power that never moves or defends themself without a weapon equipped.

To get the FULL experience and really find out I suggest you JUST PLAY IT.  Nothing to lose since it is F2P, the system requirements are low, and if you want to get a free spirit orb (or just 100 gold) use my referral code "gdaddanyt" and friend me to play some matches!! :) | i like the art work and you can't complain about the gameplay really. sure there are some people with awesome cards or decks, but its all about the strategy. it makes you think and it doesnt get boring. if it does, you can always come back to it later and appreciate the workers who put effort into making this game awesome. | Please support Chinese

Reviews:
平心而论，游戏是个好游戏。无论是由装备决定卡组使得组卡组时要综合考虑不至于每张牌都是烂强卡导致卡组千篇一律，还是多种类型的卡片的组合导致战术的多样化，PVE模式的趣味性和PVP模式的斗智斗勇（特别说一下PVP，这个游戏的PVP是真正的根据每期地图和其他对手决定的，比如对面全法师就能采用三战士六豹打，或者两战一牧，对面带五甲的战士多你的战士就多带破甲和穿甲，总之相对复杂的卡组构建，不断变化的地图和多种多样的战术选择使这个游戏的PVP充满了乐趣），还有趣味联赛中的娱乐性更强的对战，丰富多彩的收集元素，以及良心的日商周商使得不氪金也能轻松成为大佬，种种因素使得这个游戏是不错的游戏，即使没有汉化也不影响它本身的趣味性，看到这里大家就应该明白我对这个游戏的喜爱和推荐了吧。
然而，问题不仅仅这么简单，这么优秀的游戏却有着一群跟我们思维构造不同的GM和MOD，他们在没有事先通知的情况下封了几乎所有参加过PVP的人，而且时间有的多达30天甚至是365天，经常玩这个游戏热爱这个游戏每天游戏时间足够长的所有国人无一幸免，而且申诉机制异常奇怪，真正该封禁的人被解封了，无辜群众反而被关在了里面，据一些因为玩游戏频率不高而侥幸逃过一劫的国人反应，本来偏小众的游戏的在线人数进一步减少，本来一场联赛平时1分钟以内就一定能排到对手现在却排了四五分钟都无法匹配成功，游玩人数大量减少，玩家纷纷弃坑，然而面对这种结果，GM和MOD却仍然表示满意，绝对自己做得很是正确。另外，由于这个游戏是人治，所以管理上有明显的偏袒，和mod关系好的人不会被封禁然而其余人很容易被封禁，据少数国人反应，游戏内可能有一定反华倾向，在世界打字中文会收获到举报，总之你一定要做好随时被封禁的心理准备即使你只是正常的老老实实的玩游戏。一次封禁很有可能直接抹消掉你之前的时间和金钱投入，所以，即使这个游戏很有趣，但大家入坑前还是要慎重，即使决定了入坑，购买付费内容的时候还是要慎重，毕竟，他们封禁你的时候不会在乎你花了几百几千人民币的。 | Pros:  I was transported back in time 30 years, the flavor and feel of PnP RPG gaming is perfect.  The metagame story is fun and interesting.  Felt like the 1980s...

Cons:  The micropayment cash grab is gross.  You can play free for @30hrs, then you need to start buying access.
Also: this game is a _very cheap_ strat game, with minimalist card building elements.

If you want to feel the nostalgia - play for free.  Any other reason should be a pass.

I give it a thumbs up BARELY and only for the story and feels.  The game is a grind - barely entertaining. | 平时网好的时候用网页版，方便。只有网不好才用客户端，所以看起来游戏时间很少。
算上网页版至少700hrs+
好玩，时间证明一切。

Who knew killing pixelated nazis in would be just as fun now as it was in 1992 | Good characters, with an over the top plot, and easily hateable, but interesting villains. I appreciate fictional nazis for being easy to hate, it makes you want total nazi destruction. type TND for total nazi destruction!!!! | [h1] Not to be confused with the Hearts of Iron IV mod. [/h1]

[b] Wolfenstein: The New Order [/b] is the first game in MachineGame's Wolfenstein reboot series, and it's really fucking good.

[h2] Gameplay [/h2]
The best way to describe this game is Call of Duty if it was a bit less reliant on cover (I will likely be flamed for saying that sentence). As William B.J. Blazkowicz, you use a variety of guns, most of which being able to be dual wielded, with your arsenal resetting between almost every level, to defeat enemies. Similar to DOOM you have both health and armour, but your health regenerates in blocks of twenty, enticing you to not just blindly rush into the field. As you kill enemies in specific ways you gain perks, which make you better in some ways.

Across levels you can also find many collectibles, including weapon upgrades (usually alternate fire modes), health/armour upgrades, gold artefacts and letters. The game encourages replayability, with a thing I'll mention in the story section.

[h2] Story [/h2]

The Allies have lost World War II, and the Nazis have won due to some crazy technology, resulting in them enacting complete world domination. You get involved in a resistance over a decade after the war to defeat their regime. 

Towards the start of the game you make a choice, affecting both the narrative as well as some gameplay mechanics and upgrades. It's not massively different and the core story plays out practically the same no matter the outcome, but it's a cool mechanic, and implores you to play the game multiple times.

[h2] Graphics [/h2]

Being a 2014 game that's not Crysis it's not particularly a looker, but the devs had a keen eye for art direction, as despite the technological shortcomings it does a solid job at immersing you into the world. It's not the most immersive game ever made, but the devs did well with the tech of the time. Runs pretty great too, save for screenshotting via Steam, which causes the game to freeze as well and temporarily get rid of some screen effects, such as when the game cuts to black.

[h2] Verdict [/h2]

Overall, I hereby declare [b] Wolfenstein: The New Order [/b] as 

[h3] REALLY FUCKING GOOD [/h3]

While the game is pretty cheap by itself, the game goes much cheaper during a sale, but honestly you can't go wrong buying it at full price
cleaned_review: A great game, with a great story and a great storyline.

Є таке, що словами чи навіть зображеннями і відео не передати, це треба просто відчути. Попри крихітні не критичні технічні проблеми (такі ігри занурюють тебе в свою атмосферу так глибоко, що навіть не помічаєш такого) ця гра разом з Тінню Чорнобиля займала перше місце серед моїх ігор... до виходу Серця Чорнобиля, звичайно :) І як я писав вже в рецензії до ТЧ, що можна писати цілі сторінки з дифірамбами, але це всеодно не зможе описати красу цієї гри, це треба спробувати :)

Влітає на блокпост, проходить його наскрізь, ледве не протаранивши БТР, і несеться дорогою геть від зони…

Game Name: Heroes® of Might & Magic® III - HD Edition
Reviews:
The game itself as many others write is not the Complete edition avaiable on GoG for less cash. The game stutters strangely and moats don't work whatsoever in this version. Experienced a few crashes. A lot of hotkeys are also missing. Just get the other one. | Heroes® of Might & Magic® III - HD Edition brings back many cherished memories. This was *the* game of my youth, and diving back into it with updated graphics is like reuniting with an old friend who looks even better than you remember.  

The gameplay is as magical as ever—exploring the map, planning your strategies, and building your perfect army is just as thrilling now as it was back then. Every turn feels like a little puzzle, and I still get that same rush when I finally capture a key town or outsmart an opponent in battle.  

The updated visuals are a nice touch. Seeing the towns and units in high definition made me appreciate how much detail the original game had. It’s not a complete remake, but it’s faithful to the charm and spirit of the classic, and that’s what matters most to me.  

Sure, it doesn’t include the expansions, and I wish it did, but even the base game has so much to offer. Whether you’re revisiting it like me or trying it for the first time, there’s a reason this game is a legend in the strategy genre.  

Heroes III will always hold a special place in my heart, and this HD edition has made the nostalgia even sweeter. | Почему не выпустили полное издание?
Why didn't they release a full edition?

Reviews:
Я вважаю цю гру кращою за серію Civilization. Мені подобаються ігри в яких фракції значно відрізняються одна від іншої. Якщо у цивці у фракцій є невеличкі відмінності які виражені парою юнітів і перками, то тут у однієї можна переміщати цілі міста, інша тераформує місцевість під себе, а дехто взагалі нормально почуває себе тільки у воді. Але є тут і недоліки які властиві більшості ігр цього жанру. А саме - якщо ти починаєш вириватись вперед по технологіям, містам і оснащенню військ, то перемога тобі забезпечена і навряд станеться щось що завадить виграти. Тобто, в середині гри ти вже починаєш розуміти що ця партія вже виграна, а до досягнення мети залишилось кроків п'ятдесят і ти просто додушуєш цю катку.
   Дуже раджу всим любителям цивілоподібних ігор. На перших порах будете воювати з інтерфейсом, але як звикаєш, то розумієш що він все таки зручний. І, як на мене, він зрозуміліший ніж в тій же цивці. | This is the Big One. The best, most imaginative, and fun strategy game of its kind. 

A psychedelic diamond. | A社 (Amplitude Studios) 的無盡系列策略遊戲，包括《ENDLESS Space》1跟2、《無盡帝國》，這些遊戲能用的派系不多，但每個派系都很有特色，使用不同派系時，策略必須大幅改變，在這方面比《文明帝國》系列有趣，《文明帝國》系列加上DLC後有很多派系，但不同派系的差異較小，而且有不少派系的特徵比較平淡無趣。
A社是規模不大的獨立開發商，為了節省成本，A社遊戲的聲光效果比不上大作，例如無盡系列的派系領導，畫面和語音較簡陋，但A社擅長設計感，用設計感彌補成本劣勢，遊戲中的各種美術設計都很好看，音樂與音效也不錯。
A社的策略遊戲，有很多要素都是模仿《文明帝國》系列，但A社也有各種創新，例如無盡系列，比《文明帝國6》更早採用"城市區域系統"，也比《文明7》更早採用：地形高低差、改良設施不用工人。A社《HUMANKIND》可途中切換不同派系，《文明帝國7》也有採用，結果《文明帝國》越來越像A社遊戲，有城市區域系統、地形高低差、改良設施不用工人、可途中切換不同派系。
幾年前A社預告《HUMANKIND》的時候，我原本希望它能沿用無盡傳統：派系比《文明帝國》少、但更有特色，可惜A社走相反路線，《HUMANKIND》派系非常多，但都較沒特色。
在國際上，無盡系列的平均評價比《HUMANKIND》高很多，許多A社粉絲對《HUMANKIND》感到失望....
最近A社正在開發《無盡帝國2》，希望它的派系能像一代那樣特別 | Endless games are very fun. Really enjoyed this over something like Civ, and the storylines are all so unique and engaging. The lore is intriguing and every race plays so dramatically differently from the others. | Сейчас уже мало кто об этом вспомнит, но ещё до выхода шестой цывы, эта игра изменила правила игры в жанре пошаговых глобальных стратегий, и именно от сюда фераксис позаимствовала, почти все, новые геймплейные фишки для новой цивилизации!
Именно здесь одной из первых появилась новая система развития городов, прокачки войск и серьёзного различия в геймплее за различные расы.
До сих пор актуальная, уже классика.

Outside of nostalgia factor, I don't know how much this holds up to other empire strategy games. Worst thing I can say about it is it relies too heavily on war mechanics, compared to something like Civilization.

Reviews:
The game is super fun but the pricetag is misleading. It doesn't cost 15$, it also costs like 1-2 friendships. |   初见这个游戏画风这么可爱，完全没意识到问题的严重性，因为有存档点，而且有队友带着，闭着眼睛乱跳都可以，死了瞬间复活到队友身边。就这样偷鸡玩，直到疯狂模式（无伤），出大问题！卡住过不去了，前面漏的课一节都少不了，有种读到大学从新从小学上起的美。

   第 1-5章关卡只需要多走两遍就行，不难，还可以欢声笑语度过
   第6-7章开始上强度了，考验反应能力和配合能力了，一直在失误破防调整，失误破防调整。
   第8章已经不是在操作了，是对队友的信念和默契一直支撑到终点。

  感谢你，从最开始手把手的教，到中途我掉链子，也给足够时间和耐心等我成长，跟上进度，以及最后艰难关卡的独当一面。才有了最后的疯狂双打成就，这是一趟宝贵又独特的游戏体验，非常感谢你！最靠谱的队友！！ | Battleblock Theater is a platformer game that has 8 levels of 13 stages. Each level is innovatively created and can be done using equipped skills as well. There are tons of prisoner heads to collect which motivates me to collect all the gems to unlock them. I really love the art style, which is so simple yet so pleasing. There is also 2 difficulty, the normal difficulty and the insane difficulty, which has the perma death feature for each stage. There is also community maps along with arena game modes. This game is perfect for platformer lovers, some stages can get quite hard which made it all the more worth it to complete. Definitely recommended! | A trilha sonora do jogo é uma clássica obra prima que me faz chorar quando eu a ouço, tanto pelos olhos quando pelo ouvido de tão boa que é. jogue com seu melhor amigo, você não ira se arrepender. | It's fun, fast paced, the story is wild, no one believes in you, you can blow your friends with mines, and you can watch them drown, what more joy do you need?
cleaned_review: The game is a classic work, but the price tag is misleading. It doesn't cost 15$, it also costs like 1-2 friendships.

Reviews:
I've tried starting this game multiple times but every time is has managed to lose my interest.
There's really nothing special about the two main parts of the game being combat and the story.

Only time where I really enjoyed playing is one section with multiple extended combat encounters where I had to plan out a strategy and ration my consumable items. Not sure if it was scripted or a random chance on doing a mission but I ended up getting a surprise combat after I believed everything was finished.

The hacking "decking" mechanic is a complete waste of time and consists of even worse combat just to use cameras for vision where it doesn't matter or turrets in areas where no enemies go. It also uses turns in combat so you're missing a fourth party member just to do it.
The Shaman class is one that I want to like but can't because of your summons have a chance to escape and turn on you every turn with increasing chances. I love the idea of support classes in general, but even its haste buff feels underwhelming. The range on the starting Shaman NPC's damage reduction aoe is also so short that there's no point in using it. 

The story isn't great either. A good majority of your supporting characters either do not like you or do not trust you which leads you to pry scraps and pieces of information from them over time. You're also mostly doing a bunch of disjointed side missions ranging from mildly interesting to a waste of time that makes you dislike your party members even more because they disapproved of you doing the morally right thing or doing anything risky. All of this is sometimes broken up by story exposition that goes on for too long and does not result in anything except your team's information broker saying that he'll look into it. | A good CRPG for its modest budget. Liked the companions and the main story while taking some predictable turns remained enjoyable for the most part, seems like there is a decent variety of outcomes, will probably replay it with couple more builds to see how things play out with different choices and I want to see what passing some skillchecks does, unlike modern CRPGs you can't use party members to pass them, gotta do most of them yourself. There is definitely an intent for you to play some specific builds like INT with high biotech skill. Can't say for sure that all build options are equally interesting and rewarding but a rather simpleminded "All points in Quickness" basic gunslinger with just enough Charisma to get two etiquettes: corporate and shadowrunner, still was satisfying on the first playthrough. Just don't take Socialite, seen like one etiquette check involving it through the whole game and it was just for a bit extra money, stick to something like Security or Academic instead.

On an additional note, I couldn't help finding the epilogue of the main story a bit underwhelming. You make the final choice, go back to your home, talk about it with your crew and then get a bit of extra context on what transpired and what's gonna happen from couple very important (in a setting, not narrative, that is) NPCs before getting a text epilogue that tells about the several events in the future, some of them probably an outcome of your decisions throughout the game. And that's it. I guess the underwhelming part is a natural outcome of the narrative framing, you get dragged into this deadly grand mystery and resolving it is the only way to survive but you don't really have any other motivation, at best to avenge an NPC who dies in the prologue and another NPC who dies in the middle of the game. So while your involvement is narratively justified, the personal stakes you and your companions have don't feel interesting?  No matter how well you furnish it with dialogues "Phew, that was quite something. Glad we survived. What do we do now?" is still something lacking oomph, at least for me. | DragonFall Nails it.

From the tone of the world, to the depth and nuance of the characters you encounter the writing in this game walks the line of "in world" conversations while not verging into the valley of cringe that is easy to slip into. 

This entry has just enough beats to satisfy, challenging fun combat and options to make it your own.  

this is an instant key entry to the genre. I will be stealing characters and setting elements for my live game | Loved this. I slept on the SR series for years, picked this up mostly for research, and found a lot of unexpectedly interesting design and narrative decisions. It's hard to pick one thing that SR:DF does unusually well, but the ambience, systems, narrative, writing, art never fall below 'very good' and they work together harmoniously. And of course it's really faithful to the original IP if you were there for that in the early TRPG days, so if you're here for nostalgia, fill yer boots.

Really sad when it finished - glad I have SRHK to go on to. | Good story and game play. I wish there was more combat and opportunities for conflicts.
cleaned_review: I'm not sure if it's a good CRPG, but it's not bad.

I only wish the game taught you more about the limits and possibilities of each block and mechanic

Reviews:
Интересная игра-головоломка, которая похожа на серию игр Portal (но не думайте, что она точь-в-точь клон Portal). В игре можно сказать нет сюжета, но он там особо и не нужен. Уровни построены интересно и не успевают наскучить своей однотипностью, тк ее по сути нет. К концу игры нет чувства духоты, что является преимуществом в играх головоломках. Также есть неплохие dlc к игре и режим испытаний в самой игре, который очень даже хорош.

Из минусов только то, что музыка оч скудная и приходилось включать свою на фон. (ПРОХОДИЛА РЕЖИССЕРСКУЮ ВЕРСИЮ) | 이 게임 환상의 에피소드임
cleaned_review: The game is a bit slow, but the graphics are good.

Reviews:
There is a 10th anniversary edition which can effectively be called a remaster with better everything (including some reworked puzzles), get it instead. This edition of the game is dated and good for collecting purposes.

Good but rather short puzzle game.
Has a "story" (yep exactly in "", it's not much, just a narrator who fills the void) for atmosphere with some Portal vibes to it.
The puzzles aren't that hard, some are easy, some are interesting. Each stage adds different variations to the mechanics. Only few of them I found annoying. There are also time running challenges as a separate mode if you are up for it. | Almost direct downgrade from the original QUBE as it adds a poorly written story to a game that didn't need one in the first place and then makes the music worse to keep it in line with the story.

The game is just missing the sound effect and music sliders the original game had, which I would have forgiven if they at least gave a slider to mute the story narration.

They also removed half of the "hardest puzzle in the game" (there is an achievement), and the half they removed was the hard part. Most of the puzzles are easy and a few take just a little bit of thinking.

Edit: I've read that if you buy this version you get the original as well, but I can't confirm this. The only way I can recommend this game is if it does come with the superior original version. | fun and challenging puzzle game, with very nice desing | 中々楽しい、けど、短いかな。もっと遊びたかった。

The puzzles aren't that hard, some are easy, some are interesting. Each stage adds different variations to the mechanics. Only few of them I found annoying. There are also time running challenges as a separate mode if you are up for it. | Almost direct downgrade from the original QUBE as it adds a poorly written story to a game that didn't need one in the first place and then makes the music worse to keep it in line with the story. Most of the puzzles are easy and a few take just a little bit of thinking.

Reviews:
[h1]Pros:[/h1]
[list][*]The level design wasn't too bad.
[*]The idea of mixing games like this is pretty creative.[/list]

[h1]Cons:[/h1]
[list][*]Animations of everything felt really stiff and janky.
[*]The enemy and main character's designs felt bland and boring.
[*]Level backdrops are either floating sky island or floating crate in the sky. The slightest bit of variety in backdrops could have made the game just a bit more interesting.
[*]Hitboxes are often not where they are drawn.
[*]The game mixing idea is clever, but the characters from other games feel awful to control compared to their source games. (Not to mention small things like Dustgirl's standard jump being shorter than the main character's and Clunk being faster than Commander Video all lend to the game feeling off.)
[*]The levels often came down to "Oh no, this jump is too high, better use that jello to make a platform." or "Oh no, there's something in the way better blow it up with Clunk." making them dull. Then on levels where you need to properly time stuff for Commander Video the levels felt monotonous because you needed to guess at Video's timings and then redo the whole thing once you realize you were off by a bit.


All in all, this game is clearly a love letter to the games showcased within, but I feel the developer just didn't have the experience to make a good game out of the idea. | I have buyers remorse and I don't have buyers remorse at the same time. Would I recommend people play this game? Not really. It's just a game without substance. The platforming is very generic and the whole big gimmick of the game has been done before it's just this time you have characters from other indie titles to help you out, sometimes not even with their gimmicks from their own games. The main character you play as looks incredibly dull and boring compared to the cast of other indie titles. Most of the stages feel as if they came from a teenager making their first Steam Workshop levels. This game is a shocking missed opportunity to really make a well made product considering its potential. Currently as it is though, it's just bait. I'm not saying the game is down right horrible, it's just a game with nothing interesting or "cool" about it. Now while the game is an incredibly dull and mediocre experience so far, I will complete the game and possibly change my opinion.

 Oh right i'd also like to state, the music is terrible. Now while I do make music I am by no means that great of an artist. But this music is competing up there with Sonic Chronicles and Yoshi's New Island. Music is a core part of an enjoyable experience for me and i'm not a fan of what seems like 15 second loops. Generic Dream Pop schlock artists have made longer length in repeating notes than that.

 If you are hardcore bent on actually picking up this game, i'd wait for a patch as well, me and a friend who also owns this game have both experienced our own set of glitches and we've both only played nearly an hour of it at the time i've posted this review. | Довольно интересная игра. Главным героем выступает кот, который случайно попал в мир игры, которого, собственно, нужно оттуда вытащить. 
По ходу прохождения нам будут попадаться герои из других игр вроде Braid, BIT TRIP RUNNER. Они будут помогать нам проходить уровни.. К примеру, один герой может делать платформы, по которым можно прыгать, а другой умеет пригибаться под препятствиями. 
После того, как мы отыграем за героя из другой игры, нас возвращают в шкуру кота и вот, мы уже бежим с нашим приятелем за которого играли ранее, он выполняет те же действия, что и вы, когда играли за него. 
Так же, интересно сделана смерть нашего героя, её нету.. Время просто отматывается назад до чекпоинта (почти как в Braid). Так же, время можно отмотать и не умирая. К примеру, если вы сделали что то не так (поставили не там платформу, не собрали кристалы и т.д.), то можете всё исправить. 
Игра сделана как платформер. Граффика в игре приятная, герои хорошо прорисованны, задние планы и локации меняются и не надоедают. Музыка тоже приятная, хоть я и выключил её после 15 минут игры и включил свою.. :)
Играть, конечно же, лучше на геймпаде !это же платформер! Хотя, на клавиатуре я играть не пробывал. 

Моя оценка игре 10/10. 
  

Надеюсь, мой обзор был для вас полезен. | I enjoyed this game at the beginning.  I got to be a kitty and the early stages were fun.  However, as the game dragged on, the shortfalls grew too big to ignore.

While the idea is interesting, the execution is terrible.  Playing out each part for each hero means that you have to go through many stages multiple times and there is a lot of forced waiting for your previous play-throughs to sync with you, especially after you die.  There is a fast-forward button, but it's not enough.  The game would be a lot more fun if you didn't die from every hit; some of the windows for you to move are extremely tight, especially in the later levels where the new heroes begin to feature progressively worse control.  These issues combined really wear down on patience, even without the game's buggy nature.

Now, when I say "buggy," I mean VERY buggy, Sonic '06 buggy.  For starters, it is way too easy to clip inside platforms and get stuck, especially in the later stages.  I didn't notice any long load times, but while I was playing through, the glitches got worse.  Previous playthroughs would break synch; some enemies I killed in previous runs didn't die half the time.  In addition, the game froze on me multiple times with most of the instances being when the game rewound my progress after I died.  My PC isn't top-of-the-line, but it's more than capable of running this type of game.  However, even my whole PC crashed because of this game.  I had to do a hard reset to get everything back up.  

The developer obviously skimped on playtesting and quality control.  Avoid this one. | 나름 인지도가 높은 인디 게임 주인공들의 제 1차 드림팀.
그러나 그 드팀팀은 가벼운 동네 운동회 이상의 규모는 되지 못했다.

플래포머 게임으로써의 재미는 나쁘지 않은 편이다. 각 캐릭터의 특성이 다양하고 서로의 특성을 적극 활용하는 스테이지들이 준비가 잘 되어있어 게임 자체는 재미있게 즐길 수 있다. 거기에 각 캐릭터 고유의 메달들도 수집요소로써 준비되어 있어 이거 모으는 재미도 쏠쏠한 편. 이 메달들은 무려 스팀 도전과제와 연동이 된다. 따라서 스팀 도전과제 효율이 좋다는 장점도 같이 가져가게 된다.

각 캐릭터를 특정 타이밍 혹은 특정 순서대로 움직이고, 이전에 움직인 캐릭터와 나중에 움직일 캐릭터가 서로 연계하여 움직이며, 스테이지 내 장치들을 작동시켜 나가고 출구에 도달하는 방식으로 게임이 진행된다. Team Indie라는 게임의 설정에 부합하는 모습을 보여주고, 덕분에 게임이 꽤나 유기적으로 흘러간다. 다만 이러다보니 나중에 움직일 캐릭터를 대비해 우선 움직이는 캐릭터를 미리 움직여 주는 것이 꽤 중요하다. 중반부만 가도 이 계산이 꼬일 때가 많다. 

판정이 그다지 직관적이지는 못한데, 자신이 생각한 것 보다 약간 다르게 움직여 죽게 되는 상황이 꽤나 생긴다. 거기다 이전에 움직였던 캐릭터의 움직임이 제대로 반영이 안 되거나 좁은 곳에 낑기기도 하는 등의 버그도 가끔 발생하곤 하니 조금 골치가 아프다.

하지만 이런 점보다 내가 이 게임에 가장 실망한 부분은 그저 다른 인디 게임 주인공을 모아둔 게임, 그 이상을 보여주지 못했다는 것. 단순히 다른 인디 게임의 주인공만 모였을 뿐, 서로 다른 주인공들간의 상호작용 같은 것이 전무하다는 것이다. 그저 각 캐릭터들의 특성(그나마도 특수능력 한두개 정도만 구현된 수준이다.)을 통해 스테이지를 클리어해 나가기만 하며, 그들간의 소소한 대화나 다툼 같은 상호작용이 전혀 없다. 적어도 슈퍼로봇대전이나 킹 오브 파이터즈 같은 그림을 바랬었는데, 현실은 그냥 이런 저런 인디 게임 캐릭터들 모아놓은 갤러리 정도밖에 되지 못했다.

인디 게임의 주인공들 중에선 꽤나 유명한 녀석들이 많이 등장하니 Team Indie에 등장하는 녀석들 중 네다섯 이상을 알고있다! 하는 사람들이라면 한 번 쯤 즐겨볼 만 하다. (본인은 딱 한 놈 빼고 다 알고 있었고) 반대로, 여기 등장하는 녀석들 중 모르는 놈들이 많다 하는 분들에게는 딱히 추천하고 싶진 않다.
cleaned_review: The game mixing idea is clever, but the characters from other games feel awful to control compared to their source games. (Not to mention small things like Dustgirl's standard jump being shorter than the main character's and Clunk being faster than Commander Video all lend to the game feeling off)

Reviews:
23小时没看攻略全完美通关了。游戏关卡设置的相当精妙，所有的雷都可以被推理出来，完美过关的时候是非常有成就感的。玩这个游戏需要静下心来慢慢推理，从第五章开始每个关卡基本都需要半个小时以上的时间进行解题（相当的消磨时间。游戏从第五章开始解题的方法开始固定下来，基本就是那几种来来回回，不过这也可以理解，毕竟这种类扫雷型的游戏发挥空间就这么大。但是话又说回来了，虽然解法比较固定，但是被卡在某一步许久也是经常的事。在解题的过程中不仅考验自己的推理能力，同样也能感受到作者的巧思。对我来说这是一款相当有趣的游戏，我是六块史低入手的，但是要我原价22购入的话我也觉得值得。（顺带吐槽下6-6和6-5两关是不是放反了，6-5我解了将近一个小时，6-6十五分钟不到就解完了 | Minimalist, elegant, and endlessly engaging. Hexcells Infinite is a true gem for puzzle lovers. The ability to generate infinite levels means you’ll never run out of new challenges. A perfect game to exercise your brain! | 后面好多地方不能推理，完全靠运气 | Years after release this is still my preferred 'load up a random puzzle and solve it' game. Very comfy, good ambiance. Works well enough on Steam Deck to be a good 'cool down before sleep' game. As the name implies, 'infinite' means you aren't likely to run out of puzzles to solve anytime soon.

I would highly recommend the bundle for a good difficulty curve of hand-crafted puzzles, though, as this is the third game in the series. The hand-crafted puzzles in this set ramp up in difficulty much faster than the other two. | Hexcells Infinite has latched onto my brain like a puzzle-solving parasite, and I'm not mad about it. This game is the perfect blend of Minesweeper's simplicity and a logic puzzle's complexity, creating a loop of "just one more puzzle" that somehow turns into hours. The infinite mode is a bottomless pit of challenges, each one a deliciously rewarding mini-victory for my brain. The difficulty is just right – it keeps me on my toes without making me want to throw my mouse out the window. And the fact that I can jump in and out with puzzles that fit into any spare moment is无比 convenient. Hexcells Infinite is like a good book; once you start, it's hard to put down. If you're looking for a game that's as satisfying as it is challenging, look no further. This one's a keeper!

Glitches, broken physics make this game unplayable nowadays.

I loved it on Windows 95 but sadly it doesn't work any more. Don't buy! | Худшая часть серии — отвратительный интерфейс, полотна текста к задачам уровня, невразумительная графика и очень много деда. Но загадки хорошие.

Genres: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Free To Play
Reviews:
Giriş:
Unturned, Nelson Sexton tarafından geliştirilen ve 2014 yılında erken erişime açılan ücretsiz bir hayatta kalma oyunudur. Oyun, blok tarzı grafiklerle sunulan bir dünyada geçer ve oyuncuların hayatta kalmak için kaynak toplaması, barınak inşa etmesi ve zombilerle savaşması gerekmektedir.

Oynanış:
Unturned, oyunculara geniş bir dünya sunar. Kaynak toplama, yiyecek bulma ve silah yapma gibi temel hayatta kalma unsurlarıyla doludur. Zombilerle dolu bu dünyada, hayatta kalmak için stratejik düşünmek önemlidir. Ayrıca, oyuncular arasında işbirliği yapma veya rekabet etme seçeneği de vardır.

Kendi Yorumum:
Oynanış dinamikleri oldukça eğlenceli ve bağımlılık yapıcı. Özellikle arkadaşlarla birlikte oynandığında, keşif ve hayatta kalma unsurları çok daha keyifli hale geliyor. Ancak, bazen oyunun basit grafikleri ve mekanikleri bazı oyuncular için çekiciliğini azaltabilir.

Grafikler ve Ses:
Unturned, blok tarzı grafiklerle sunulmasına rağmen, bu tasarımın kendine özgü bir cazibesi var. Ses efektleri, oyunun atmosferini destekliyor, ancak bazen daha fazla çeşitlilik bekleyebilirsiniz.

Kendi Yorumum:
Grafikler basit olsa da, bu durum oyunun eğlencesini etkilemiyor. Hatta bazı oyuncular bu tarzı sevebilir. Ancak, daha gerçekçi bir deneyim arayanlar için hayal kırıklığı yaratabilir.

Topluluk ve Mod Desteği:
Unturned, aktif bir topluluğa ve geniş bir mod desteğine sahiptir. Oyuncular, çeşitli modlar ve sunucular aracılığıyla oyunu özelleştirebilir. Bu, oyunun ömrünü uzatır ve farklı deneyimler sunar.

Kendi Yorumum:
Topluluk, oldukça destekleyici ve yenilikçi. Modlar, oyunun eğlencesini artırıyor ve sürekli yeni içerikler sunuyor. Ancak, bazı sunuculardaki toksik davranışlar can sıkıcı olabilir.

Sonuç:
Unturned, hayatta kalma oyunları arasında kendine özgü bir yer edinmiştir. Basit ama eğlenceli yapısıyla, oyunculara hem zorlu hem de keyifli bir deneyim sunar. Eğer arkadaşlarınızla birlikte eğlenceli bir hayatta kalma oyunu arıyorsanız, Unturned kesinlikle denemeye değer. Kişisel olarak, bu oyunun sunduğu eğlence ve topluluk etkileşimleri, onu benim favori oyunlarımdan biri haline getiriyor. | ein bester server und spilt es holt euch das gold dlc | KA*AR ERAYIN BİLGİSAYARININ KALDIRDIĞI TEK OYUN | yes, and yes | 不好玩

It is a film that combines elements of block graphics and a broader world of action, bringing together actors and players to play and to fight. It is also a film that focuses on the central themes of the film, such as the conflict and the struggle against zombies.

Game Name: Fallout: A Post Nuclear Role Playing Game
Reviews:
Fallout це коли ти сидиш із цілковитою впевненістю, що все під контролем, а гра робить тебе об’єктом для експериментів. Увійшов у кімнату, відкрив двері І ОПА НАХ СЮДА ІДІ, Найткін із плазмовою гвинтівкою вже обіймає тебе теплом радіаційного удару. [b]Ласкаво просимо в момент, де ти розумієш, що не зберігався години чотири.[/b]

А боїїї, мммм. У твоїх руках пістолет, шанси на влучання - 99.99%. Перша куля в землю, друга - в стелю, третя... прямо в голову напарника. Він, до речі, теж не втикає: вирішує розстріляти радтаракана з дробовика, обов’язково через тебе. Зрештою, таракан вижив, ти ні.

Собацюра або ж Dogmeat. Найкращий друг. Найвірніший союзник. І головний герой твоїх збережень, бо це не партія, якщо вона не помирає кожен раз коли ти згадуєш про неї(завжди). Поки ти відволікся на рейдерів, вона кидається на радтаракана, який взагалі міг би спокійно жити своїм життям. Три постріли по ній, і ти знову натискаєш “Завантажити”, але на цей раз точно востаннє))) ага.
 
Ти допомагаєш торговцю розібратися з рейдерами, а потім з’ясовуєш, що його "торгфвля" - це проституція, і твоя винагорода - це безкоштовний сеанс, про який ти пошкодуєш до кінця гри.

Ти допомагаєш фермеру, захищаєш його від рейдерів, і в знак подяки він каже: "Дякую! А тепер залишайся на ніч, бо вранці ми з тобою граємо в рулетку за мою доньку". 

Ти вирішуєш поговорити з супермутантом, бо у тебе високий рівень красномовства. Він спокійно вислуховує тебе, киває головою, а потім каже: "Ну а тепер ми просто тебе захаваєм, бо [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ITh3FwqighU&ab_channel=UamusicKo] ти дофіга піздиш. [/url]

Ти вбиваєш супермутанта, знімаєш із нього броню і думаєш: "Це найкращий лут у грі." Через 5 хвилин з'ясовуєш, що броня радіоактивна, і тепер у тебе з кожною секундою все більше "несподіваних новоутворень".

Це гра, яка нагадує, що ти не просто гравець, а головний клоун у цирку апокаліпсису. Кожен твій вибір - це помилка, кожен крок - це шанс втратити останній шматок здорового глузду. | This was my first CRPG and I would argue it was a great place to start (especially if you are like me and can't run Baldur's Gate III). I went into this primarily as a fan of Fallout: New Vegas and that's kind of how I'm framing this review (no major spoilers though). I had come to understand that despite being in an entirely different genre, the rich and believable world of Fallout: New Vegas, along with its willingness to present tough choices with real consequences, could be traced back to the original game in the series. I wanted more of that universe and its choices, and Fallout 1 more than delivered.

That being said, the game asks a lot of you. It requires far more patience than just about any modern game I've played, and even then the reward for this patience is less tangible than, say, defeating a boss in a soulslike. This game asks you to do a lot of reading, with the reward ultimately kind of being... more reading. However mundane that sounds, the dialogue here is among the best rewards in any game I can think of. The writing is subtler than New Vegas, the comedy a little more sparse (yet equally funny), and the tone more focused... and what a tone it is. This game is *bleak*. It hasn't yet been 100 years since the bombs fell, and it shows. Civilization is only just beginning to rebuild. Fallout 1's characters take this world very seriously, because it appears they have no other choice.

Having given all that praise, on a first playthrough, I did feel like I was waving a cane in the dark. Stats are everything, so build a character poorly and you could be SOL, especially given the time limit on the main quest (the timer is actually quite forgiving, but it definitely didn't feel that way without knowing how far along the quest I was). Dialogue choices with major consequences are often not presented that way, and combat encounters come out of absolute nowhere at times. I learned to save frequently which mostly circumvented these problems, but there was definitely a good deal of frustration, especially at first. I also had to use a guide a few times, with some clues for progression being just a little too cryptic in my opinion (oldheads may disagree).

Ultimately, all of the resistance that came along with this game only made it that much more rewarding to complete. The feeling of finally taking out a Deathclaw, or repairing a robot using context clues alone and watching it clear a path forward, or realizing that the once-unintuitive controls had become second nature, or random-encountering a crashed alien spaceship, or losing a companion and choosing to let the story go on without them. Each of these moments meant a lot, and there were countless others like them.

This is definitely not a game to come home to during a stressful week at work, but it *is* a game to fall in love with on a long weekend. I highly recommend. | Despite its age and dated graphics, Fallout 1 remains an outstanding experience that truly embodies the post-apocalyptic genre. The game’s gripping narrative, immersive setting, and brutal atmosphere all combine to create a world that feels genuinely hostile and unforgiving.

One of Fallout 1’s greatest strengths is its complexity. There are no convenient quest markers here—if you want to succeed, you’ll have to pay attention, explore, and put in the effort. In the early stages, you’ll feel weak and vulnerable, yet good tactics and resourcefulness can carry you further than you’d expect. When you finally grow strong, that sense of power is palpable, but the game never stops being dangerous; even a high-level character can still meet a swift demise if you’re careless.

Overall, Fallout 1 delivers a challenging, deeply rewarding experience that stands the test of time. It’s a must-play for anyone looking to truly immerse themselves in a stark, post-nuclear world. Fallout New Vegas is called the best Fallout game even, but this one set the tone and started it all! | Не идеальная, но прекрасная игра. В начале может показаться, что слишком много свободы, боишься, что запутаешься, не сможешь понять, куда идти дальше, но поговорив с нпс всё становится понятно.
10 крышек из 10. |

Game Name: Fallout 2: A Post Nuclear Role Playing Game
Reviews:
[h3]Що тут тільки зі мною не відбувалось. Пристебніться і полетіли.[/h3]

[b]Вмантюлив дитині електрошокером. Просто так, заради наукового експерименту. Результати експерименту: дитина більше не бігає, я - задоволений.[/b]

[b]Торгував з людьми людьми, а потім у певний момент я знайшов плащ і почав ходити по місту, наче Бетмен. Жителі міста це не оцінили, але дехто заплатив, щоб я від них відчепився. Бізнес є бізнес.[/b]

[b]Заробляти гроші на боях скорпіонів - ідеально. До того моменту, коли я вирішив, що можу перемогти скорпіона самотужки. Скорпіон мав іншу думку, і мої амбіції швидко зійшли нанівець.[/b]

[b]Пройти гру як абсолютний ідіот - це окреме мистецтво. Якщо зробити персонажа з мінімальним інтелектом, діалоги перетворюються на безглузде бурмотіння. NPC сміються, вороги б’ють, а я просто живу своїм звичним життям.[/b]

[b]Розмовляв із коровою. Що тут ще додати? Вони були значно розумнішими за багатьох людей.[/b]

[b]Став президентом США. КАМАЛА СОСАТЬ.[/b]

[b]Годував наркоманів хімікатами, просто щоб перевірити, чи стане їм краще. Їм не стало. Але тепер я знаю, що таке передозування з п’ятої спроби.[/b]

[b]Крав у дітей.. Не те щоб воно мені були потрібно, просто хотілося подивитися, як далеко я можу зайти...[/b]

[b]Переконав секту пустелі, що я їхній пророк. Вони дали мені свою віру, я віддав їх рейдерам. Угода вдалася.[/b]

[b]Обдурив власника казино, сказавши, що я його давно зниклий родич. Чудово мати родину.[/b]

[b]Запустив ядерну ракету в невідомому напрямку. Бо чому б і ні? Світ уже зруйнований, одна ракета туди, одна ракета сюди) [/b]

[b]Переконав мутанта, що я теж мутант. [/b]

[b]Вирішив усі конфлікти дипломатією, а потім під кінець все одно всіх перестріляв. Стара добра класика.[/b]

[b]Змінив стать персонажа посеред гри і зрозумів, що життя після цього не стало простішим.[/b]

[b]Отримав «синдром імпотенції» після невдалого побачення. життєво. [/b]

[b]Став героєм дітей-сиріт, принісши їм або солодощі, або зброю. Вибір очевидний - діти мають вчитися виживати.[/b]

[b]Зібрав усі можливі хвороби у грі і став ходячою загрозою для суспільства. Навіть мутанти зі мною не спілкувались.[/b]

[b]Підписав контракт на зйомки в порно в Нью-Рено. Все йшло чудово, поки характеристики не підвели, і я став посміховиськом індустрії.[/b]

Гра - справжній витвір мистецтва з чудовою атмосферою постапокаліпсису. Брудний, занедбаний світ, де ніхто не дбає про мораль, але всі дбають про виживання. Діалоги похмурі, цинічні та наповнені чорним гумором, що чудово передає відчайдушну атмосферу світу після війни. Музика - шедевр, а голоси персонажів дивом не викликають бажання вимкнути звук.
Звісно, є і мінуси. Графіка стара, і гра не адаптована під сучасні роздільні здатності, тому іноді важко зрозуміти, чи ти дивишся на купу пікселів, чи на чергового ворога. Гра не прощає помилок: неправильний вибір навичок - і ти офіційно перестворюєш збередення. 

Також зауважте, що Steam версія цензурована - без дітей і тд, що позбавляє багатьох можливостей для... соціального експерименту :) | É engraçado como esse jogo é enorme em playtime (vai de 45h~50h pra finalizar a main quest e fazer outras sidequests) e ainda assim parece uma expansão do Fallout 1. Ele melhora muitas coisas, mas a história é inferior a do primeiro, mas como complemento (e de novo, pensando como se fosse uma DLC) funciona bem demais. É um jogo frustrante (no bom sentido) que força e incita vários playthroughs, assim como o primeiro também possui essa qualidade. Sinto que o Fallout 1 é melhor pelo fator inovação e por apresentar um mundo tão ou mais complexo que o desse jogo, mesmo com uma duração e mundo bem menores. Se o Fallout 2 tem uma boa história, é porque ele se alicerça muito em quase todas as fundações que o primeiro construiu. E se for pra colocar algum defeito, é que o budget desse jogo foi claramente muito pequeno. Tem vários cenários repetidos ao longo do jogo, assim como cenários idênticos aos do primeiro jogo. Pra se ter uma ideia, no final do Fallout 1 você tinha artes conceituais que contavam o futuro de cada terreno do jogo. Neste, eles mal conseguiram fazer essas artes pra todos os territórios, em vários, eles só tinham umas fotos que vagamente remetiam ao cenário originário.

Enfim, eu recomendo bastante, mas acho que ele te pegará e prenderá muito mais se você jogar o primeiro antes. O combate pode ser chato e até meio complicado no começo, mas depois, quando você entende como ele funciona, vira uma das coisas mais divertidas desses jogos. | Me da mucho miedo el mosco ese de la portada, me regaña porque no traigo servoarmadura, que bueno que me lo chingué | My character:

- lost the match in chess against a radscorpion,
- became a p*rn star,
- blew up the toilet and left the whole village in local excrement,
- slept with someone's wife,
- kidnapped a young drug maker and sold him to the slave guild (because why not),
- won in a boxing tournament and became famous,

Reviews:
Tactical ? Déplacements moisie, angles de vues pourris, tour par tour lent, des trucs qui vont pas avec les PA que je ne peux pas utiliser entièrement pour un déplacement. Tutoriel probablement incomplet ? Ou jeu bidon. | Fallout Tactics takes the beloved Fallout universe and shifts it into squad-based, tactical combat—think XCOM meets the wasteland. Unlike the main RPG entries, this game focuses on strategic battles, giving you full control over a squad of Brotherhood of Steel soldiers as they fight raiders, mutants, and all the horrors of post-apocalyptic America.

The combat is deep and rewarding, offering both turn-based and real-time modes to suit different playstyles. Customizing your squad, managing resources, and adapting to brutal encounters keeps things engaging. While it lacks the open-world freedom of mainline Fallout games, its tight mission structure and tactical depth make it a unique and underrated gem in the series.

It may not be everyone’s cup of Nuka-Cola, but for strategy fans who love Fallout’s setting, Tactics delivers a challenging and satisfying experience—just don’t expect deep dialogue or karma decisions. | Se você já conhece a franquia, vou direto para a parte que talvez possa lhe interessar:

Fallout Tactics é muito dinâmico, os combates não são por turno (a menos que você use VATS, claro) e você precisa montar estratégias de combate para vencer os inimigos.
Você monta seu esquadrão (até 6 pessoas) e vai upando as habilidades deles.
Basicamente você e seu esquadrão são integrantes da Brotherhood e seu superior fica te enviando para algum lugar para cumprir uma missão de resgatar uma pessoa, buscar tecnologia, etc.
Portanto, não é mundo aberto nem 100% RPG. Também não espere uma história com um enredo mega desenvolvido.

Em conclusão, se você ama Fallout e quer jogar um jogo mais antigo que o Fallout 3, sugiro começar por este. | *Sigh* This is Fallout Tactics Brotherhood of Steel (It's alright) | Эта игра лучше чем 99% игр которые вы играли в своей жизни если ваш возраст до 40 лет

Pyrocyniacal puts out a commentary video.

Shows floating point as gameplay.

I download the gaem.

I play the gaem for 200h.

I recomend the creator/s to send it to microsoft cause it's a next-gen alternative for mineswapper.
Boost up some graphics maybe, custom colors and shapes and voila, one hundred million dolars. | 闲着打发时间的上品之作。虽然没有玩太久，但玩了这么一会马上就跑来写评测了

+游戏机制很有趣，重力和浮力丰富了游戏体验。
+刚开始可能不太好上手，老是被打断，渐渐熟悉后的流畅感让人上瘾。做成手游版也挺爽的。
+物理引擎很科学。
+画面简约而不简单，很耐看，如果更明亮鲜艳点或许会更好。

-模式有点单一，虽然这一种模式足够让人咀嚼半天，但多点也是为了增加趣味性。
-可以跳关。虽然没有留意难度是不是在增大，不过留有一丝挑战性才好玩，反正也不难。

走过路过，不大的游戏在你浏览商店时都能下好。况且又免费，当你在油腻的大片级游戏中感到视觉疲劳时，何不来一发FP来舒爽一下神经。 | I don't get the "overwhelmingly positive" reviews for this game. It's not a terrible game, but it's not great either. The gameplay consists of using a grappling hook (really just a red line) to swing around in arcing trajectories in order to collide with some red bars. The levels consist of some randomly-placed grey boxes to which are attached red bars. The more bars you collide with (while avoiding collisions with the grey boxes), the higher your score. That's. . . basically the whole game. Pressing "enter" allows you to skip to the next level, but as far as I can tell all of the levels are pretty much exactly the same. Just randomly-placed boxes. There doesn't seem to be a clear objective to the game either, aside from simply getting a high score. There is no endgame as far as I can tell.

Honestly, this looks like a simple proof-of-concept prototype that could have been made in Unity in an afternoon. There's hardly any content and the gameplay gets boring after a few minutes. A point in the game's favour is that it's free, so I can't really complain about the price. If you're curious, you might as well download it and try it out for yourself. But I wouldn't personally recommend it.

You should check out the developer's other game, [url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/206190/]Gunpoint[/url]. It's a much better game in my opinion. | I personally think this is THE MOST relaxing game on steam right now, there are custimization settings and everything is your pace chill and a great time waster usually runs on all computers most no system reqs and a steady 50 fps on all pcs usually | Este jogo até tem uma boa jogabilidade , uma que funcione , porem ele é muito ... incompleto , melhoraria se tivese mais cenarios , mais itens para pegar , seria legal um esquema de personalização do nosso ponto , uma melhora grafica para não ficar intediante não seria ruim .
cleaned_review: shit game I've ever played.

Reviews:
Fractured Space ist ein Teambasiertes Moba Spiel welches man vom Grundprinzip her mit LoL,Dota etc. vergleichen kann.
Ich werde nur die positiven und negativen Aspekte aufzählen,wer Infos zum Gameplay haben möchte kann sich die Beschreibung sowie Youtube Videos anschauen.

Pro:
+Open Development
(Die Entwickler befassen sich sehr stark mit den Mitspielern und zeigen ihren Entwicklungsplan offen auf dieser Website https://trello.com/b/pOsdj00F/fractured-space.Dort können Spieler ebenfalls Ideen einbringen und abstimmen welches Feature als nächtes entwickelt werden soll bzw. verbessert.Desweiteren kommen regelmäßig Entwickler auf die Gameserver wo man diese direkt ansprechen kann und aauch immer ein Feedback bekommt.Zusätzlich gibt es einen TS3 Server auf dem des öfteren ein "Community Day" abgehalten wird und man sich mit den Entwicklern sogar unterhalten kann,gesprochen wird natürlich nur in English.

+Hübsche Grafik
(Die Unreal Engine 4 bringt in diesem Spiel eine gute Leistung.Licht/Schatten,Effekte sowie Texturen sehen Größtenteils sauber und naja spacig aus^^.)

+Große Auswahl an Schiffen
(Es gibt trotz Early Acess eine Ganze Armada an verschiedenen Schiffen welche sich meistens komplett unterschiedlich spielen und einsetzen lassen.)

+Free to play Model
(Nach der Alpha wird dieses Spiel Free to play und wenn ich dass richtig beurteilen kann dann kein Pay2Win.Man kann sich im moment nur Tarnungen bzw. Skins für seine Schiffe von echten Geld kaufen,den Rest muss man sich erspielen.
Es gibt zwar Premiumschiffe nur sind diese identisch mit ihren normalen Ebenbildern und haben keine erhöten Stats,sondern geben lediglich mehr exp/credits am ende einer Runde)

+Einfache,saubere Steuerung
(Die Steuerung des Schiffes ist ziehmlich simpel gehalten trotzdem können erfahrenere Spieler anspruchsvollere Manöver ausführen als Anfänger.Also kann man sich im Spielstil weiterentwickeln was einen imensen Vorteil in manchen Situationen bringen kann.)

+Startegie Faktor
(Durch die meist langsame Bewegung der Schiffe kann man nicht immer überall sein,so muss man sich überlegen wo man als nächstes hinspringt.Man muss sich oft überlegen ob man im Sektor A bleibt oder doch lieber zu B springt um da weiter zu kommen bzw. zu verteidigen.Es gibt noch viele weitere Faktoren die ich hier nicht aufzählen möchte trd. hat dieses Spiel eine strategische Tiefe die man nicht unbeachtet lassen darf.)

Kontra:

- Bugs,teilweise unbalanciert,Crashes
(Dieses Kontra enpfinde ich als eher nichtig,da dass Spiel sich in einer Alpha befindet und somit Fehler haben darf.
Dennoch gibt es oft Mapbugs,das Spiel crashed durch Ladefehler,am Anfang einer Runde hängt sich der Server auf wodurch man warten oder das Spiel neu starten muss,manche Schiffe können mit anderen kaum bzw. garnicht mithalten usw.
Ich gehe aber davon aus,da ich oft mit entwicklern gesprochen habe,dass diese Kindheitsfehler noch behoben werden.)

-schlechte Performance/schlechte Server
(Auf meinem PC läuft dass Spiel am Anfang einer Runde sauber mit 70-80 fps allerdings verschlechtern sich diese drastisch auf bis zu 20-30 fps wenn es zu einem großen Kampf kommt.Mein PC setup steht in meiner Profilbeschreibung,ich selbst klassifiziere es als mid-high system.Wenn die Entwickler wirklich ein Free2Play Model wollen sollten sie an diesem Punkt ordentlich schrauben,sonst werden die meisten Spieler von diesem Spiel ablassen nur wegen der Performance.
Außerdem verursacht die hohe Latenz von durchschnittlich 100 eine ziehmlich bemerkbare verzögerung in der Steuerung.)


Ich persönlich vertraue auf die Entwickler da diese schon oft gezeigt haben dass sie können und wollen.
Die nahe Zusammenarbeit mit der Community und die Regelmäßigen Updates machen dieses Spiel immer besser und immer mehr Gamer tummeln sich auf den Servern.
Das größte Kontra ist die relativ schelchte Performance und der stetig hohe Ping,was das Gameplay teilweise komplett zerstört.Es wär schade wenn so ein Spiel gemieden wird,nur weil es schlechte Server und eine madige Perfomance besitzt.

Meinerseits eine Kaufempfehlung an Spieler die Sci-Fi mögen und an Competetive Moba Gamer.

Ps. über Feedback zum Review freue ich mich immer :)

 | Интересная неторопливая поначалу игра в космические кораблики плавно перетекла в активный тактический шутер с прокачкой корабля. Кораблей не очень много и на сегодня они напоминают TF2 персонажей: тяжелый и неторопливый танкующий крепыш, снайпер, шпион-подсиратель, середнячок для масс и т.д... Ну разве что для авианосца нет особого аналога. И шляп нет. Зато можно менять орудия, причем принцип действия каждого может отличаться кардинально (Например, ракеты или торпеды летят с разной скоростью и скорость наведения тоже разная, у каких-то торпед вообще наведение почти нулевое).
_
Для альфы очень неплохой задел, т.к. способности кораблей далеко не всегда помогают и решает правильное позиционирование себя на поле боя, и в соло бой вряд ли вытащишь, как бы хорошо ты не управлял кораблем, как бы не использовал астероиды для укрытия, как бы не уходил в инвиз или использовал преимущество в скорости. Игра нетороплива, но в итоге четкий просчет скоростей и состава кораблей противника позволяют творить невероятные гамбиты и вождения за нос. 
_
Для альфы стандартный набор минусов: на 28 января малый онлайн (в основном пользователи Нового Света), Ошибки матчмейкинга и частые зависания при входе в матч, в моем случае пришлось дополнительно настроить ярлык на запуск с дискретной видеокартой, как и со всеми альфами, бетами и иногда даже готовыми релизами.
_
П.С. Звуки и окружающий звук неплохо погружают в атмосферу. Пиу-пиу! Дакка-дакка! Ка-бууум! Пдыщь! Бам! | このゲームは、数千人が乗り込む巨大戦艦を操り5VS5で相手陣営の本拠点占領を目標に戦うものです。将来的にFreeToPlayになりますが、現時点で購入しておいて損にはなりません。何故ならば出資者ボーナスが付与されるだけでなく、宇宙が好き、SFが好きという方にとって満足いくものだからです。

　ゲーム内には様々な艦船がすでに実装されており、ステルス航行が可能なものや、そのステルス航行している艦船をブイを設置し探知するもの、短距離ワープを繰り返しながら戦うもの、高いHPをもった対空砲（範囲攻撃）を連射して戦うもの、長距離狙撃と味方の火力アップを担うもの、味方のHP回復や相手の武器やスキルを一時的に無効化するものなどがあります。

　それぞれの船ごとに得意な戦い方があり、苦手な相手がいます。従って○○を選べば最強というものではありません。しかしながら事前にチームを組んで戦うものではないため、その場で出会った人とチームを組んで戦う事が多く、結果的に誰もが対処できない艦船が相手に居るため負けることもあります。

　最後に。SF好きな人にとって、初期に乗れる艦船ですら、「あ、ここに飛行甲板がある！」「これは砲台だな？」と見ているだけでも結構うれしいのでは？

ホイールクリックorG   狙撃モード | Dota in SPACE*ominous voice* 

Fractured space is a 5 vs. 5 team battle on areas of space that has been divided in various sectors. All sectors have control points you need to capture in order to advance and eventually make your way to enemy base. During combat you can freely fly in the battlefield, warp into sectors where the combat is currently going on and warp back to base to regroup or to run away with your nearly destroyed ship for repairs. 

There's currently 15 different ship types in game, 3 of them unlocked right at the start. Ship types fit for many roles: long range, hard hitting sniper boat, heavily armored flagship for more close range combat, sneaky & stealthy assassin ship, fast moving frigate etc. As the game is currently in it's early stages, it understandably might have some balance issues between various ship designs - though I personally feel like every ship has their own use and an organized group will easily take down those solo snipers or assassins who think they can/should be able to kill everything themselves. 

PROs: 
Awesome ship design 
Well made level 
Graphics, sfx 

CONs 
1(one) level 
Very low playerbase (seen max of 54) 
Level Matching system(isn't one) 
No real training/tutorials 

For an EARLY ACCESS game, its good, Its not super great, but its really entertaining. Graphics are great, has a solid gameplay. People here are giving it negative reviews because they want a finished product but its no where near that stage yet. The game is great at its current stage and it can only get better from here. I'd definitely recommend this game for anyone who loves space sci-fi. | This game is a lot of fun. It's easy to play but there are a lot of intricacies for certain parts that if you learn will really help you. There isn't any sort of "pay to win" aspect of this game. All of the crew packs can be obtained through premium currency (Platinum) or standard currency that you earn in game (Credits). Other purchases are merely cosmetic, they are reskins of the ships. Different paint jobs and the like. Ships can be purchased with Platinum or Credits. 
The game is fair, and a lot of fun. The AI is actually really good in my opinion and at times can be rather challenging. 
I highly recommend this game, and I hope the developers keep working on it, adding more ships and *maps* and different crews.

nice...if you like turnbased games like x-com. try it. and your choices matters...and in addition some suprises in the game ;) | Mükemmel bir RPG oyunu. Normalde parti tabanlı rpglerden pek haz etmezdim ama bu çok zevkliydi. 

Oynanış sıra tabanlı, klasik olarak bir saldırı yapacağınızda size bir % oranı veriyor ve bu orana göre vurup vurmama ihtimaliniz belirleniyor. Tabii ki karakterlerin yeteneklerine ve kullandıkları silahlara göre bu oran değişiklik gösteriyor bu yüzden bunlara göre ayarlayıp oynamalısınız. Bunun haricinde bomba, füze gibi şeyler kullanabiliyorsunuz. Ama tabii ki bunların vurma oranı yok bu yüzden kullandığınızda kesinlikle hasar veriyorlar. Karakterlerin her birinin yeteneklerine göre değişiklik gösteren enerjileri var. Bu yüzden her sıra size döndüğünde tek vuruş yapmaya yetecek kadar enerjiniz olacak. Onun için sizin dövüşü kazanmanıza en çok yardımcı olacak rakibe saldırmanız gerekli. Ayrıca tavsiyem ağır silahlar kullanmayın, çünkü vurma ihtimalleri diğer silahlara göre daha düşük ve daha fazla mermi harcıyorlar. Çorak topraklarda bulabildiğiniz her mermi değerli olacak ve en iyi şekilde değerlendirmeniz gerekecek. Kendi adıma en çok sinirlendiğim kısım vurma oranı %80 gibi yüksek oranları gösterse de çoğu zaman saldırıları ıskalamak oldu. Büyük ihtimalle siz de oynadığınızda aynısını yaşayacaksınız hazırlıklı olmanızı öneririm. 

Karakter yükseltmelerine gelelim. Oyunda bir sürü farklı sınıf bulunuyor, istediğiniz karakteri istediğiniz sınıflara göre yükseltebiliyorsunuz. Hepsini sayamıyorum çünkü gerçekten fazla şey var. Kilit Açma, Mekanik Ustası ve Sezgi gibi beceriler işinize yarayacaktır, bunun haricinde takımınız 7 kişi olacak. Her birini farklı bir silah konusunda ustalaştırmanızı öneririm. Bu sayede aynı mermiyi kullanmak zorunda kalmayacaksınız ve daha efektif dövüşler yapabileceksiniz. Ama karakterlerinize Hayvan Dili gibi hiçbir işe yaramayacak yetenekler vermemeye çalışın çünkü işe yaramayacaklar. 

Her RPG oyununda olduğu gibi bu oyunda da seçimler ile oyunun sonunu veya olayların gidişatını değiştiriyorsunuz. Bu yüzden ona göre hareket edebilirsiniz. Ve bazı görevlerde ne yaparsanız yapın iyi sona ulaşmak mümkün olmayabilir, işin güzelliği de burda. Hikayeye gelirsek oyunda Çöl Muhafızları denilen bir askeri birliğin üyesiyiz ve onlar için çalışıyoruz. Verdikleri görevleri yerine getiriyoruz ve ya getirmiyoruz, size kalmış. Oyunun birden fazla sonu var ve emin olun hepsi sizi tatmin edecektir. 

Son olarak oyunun incelemelerine baktığımda olumsuz yazıların hepsinin Türkçe dil ile ilgili olduğunu gördüm. Aslında komik çünkü Steam'de Türkçe dil desteği var yazmasına rağmen oyun içinde olmadığını söylemişler. Bu kısmen yanlış çünkü oyunu satın aldığınızda size 2 tane oyun veriyor biri ''Wasteland 2'' diğeri ise ''Wasteland 2: Director's Cut'' evet Wasteland 2 olan versiyonda Türkçe yok ama diğer Director's Cut sürümünü indirirseniz Türkçe dil onun içinde. İki oyun arasındaki fark ne diye sorarsanız herhangi bir fark olduğunu düşünmüyorum, ikisi de hemen hemen aynı oyun. O yüzden olumsuz vermeden önce insanlar biraz araştırmalı ve yargısız infaz yapmamalı. 

Her neyse oyun kesinlikle pişman etmeyecek türden bir RPG. İndirimde 3,74 dolara kadar düşüyor. Bu fiyata bu oyun bedava sayılır. 40 saatlik bir oyun süresini garanti edebilirim. Ayrıca incelemede 4 saat gözüktüğüne bakmayın, o saat Wasteland 2 oyunundaki saatimi gösteriyor yani içinde Türkçe dil olmayan sürümü. Director's Cut sürümünde 80 saatim var. | I have played this for 28 hours and decided not to continue. It's just too sloggish. I have completed Wasteland 3, and was told Wasteland 2 has better stories and decision. That may be true, but the quality of life os Wasteland 2 is too poor in comparison to Wasteland 3. I'll just replay Wasteland 3. | Having played for years across many platforms I still love this game | bastante bueno

Reviews:
最后一幕带着帮助过的npc们攻入要塞，就算没有任何的cg或是演出，仅仅是几个立绘和一句“我们来帮助你们”就足够让人心潮澎湃了 | Wasteland 2 is old-school, tactical RPG goodness with a post-apocalyptic twist. As the spiritual successor to the original Wasteland (and granddaddy of Fallout), it delivers deep turn-based combat, tough moral choices, and a world that reacts to your every decision—sometimes in hilariously brutal ways.

The game’s writing is sharp, filled with dark humor, strange factions, and quests that rarely have a clear “right” answer. Squad customization is top-notch, letting you build a team of Desert Rangers suited for diplomacy, hacking, or just good old-fashioned shootouts. Every bullet counts, every decision matters, and the wasteland never plays fair.

Sure, it’s tough, a little clunky at times, and doesn’t hold your hand—but for fans of classic CRPGs, Wasteland 2 is a must-play. Just remember: save often, and never underestimate a guy with a sawed-off shotgun. | Liked the gameplay and the combat very much
I really disliked the quest log (could add at least what town the quest is in) and some of the quests, they require skills and parameters that are really hidden.
Other than that, enjoyed, was fun, was challenging, go Rangers! | Ist ganz gut. Für 10€ macht man keinen Fehler. Gut zum rumwuseln.

Das Kampf-System ist Müll. 
Die (deutsche) Übersetzung löst fremdschämen aus. 
Der Humor ist Kategorie "lustiges A*loch". 
Die Kommunikation mit dem Spieler ist so wie der Humor. | 100% recommend this game to anyone that"s a fan of the genre. Post apoc rpg at its finest. 
I will be sinking plenty of more hours into this.

Reviews:
经典之作，机制玩法完成度放在现在也很能打，画面物理在当时应该是算优秀的，非常推荐打折入。
游戏的系统机制和其他类似游戏很不一样，手册也有很多没说清楚的地方，个人摸索理解了一下：
本作比起战斗“竞速”更像纯撞车德比游戏，通过破坏行为获得积分并延后时间限制。胜利失败(加不加名次)由结算时获得的积分进行判定，一般通过摧毁所有对手进行结算。
完成竞速是结算的一种办法，人机对手永远不会在竞速中获胜。
人机只会在玩家处于附近的时候处于实际运行状态，会撞车翻车等等。不在玩家附近时，人机的 位置 可能会在地图路线上随机移动或者移动到玩家附近。
人机无法修车和自主重置，玩家可以，因此玩家有非常大的优势。
在75、50、25名时解锁更高级的性能升级。通关时出现作弊等级的性能升级，安装后车辆的攻击力防御力相当离谱。
车辆解锁可能是最令人疑惑的部分。流程中车辆解锁是固定的直线加速车、机器人赛车、大脚超跑、斯拉夫越野、疯机械师蹦蹦、低底盘、拖车、铲车以及通关奖励警用镇压者。以上为正常解锁的载具，带有独特的内饰。其他所有载具会带有CHEAT的标识在通关后赠送，内饰均套用的主角车内饰。 | it's like a demolition derby, except it takes place out on the streets and you get to run people over
sure it's technically a race with checkpoints and laps, but that's lame and boring
there's also a "panic button" that removes the people and the blood so you can play it while your parents watch
 
very fun | Играйте на телефонах, версия в плей маркете легально бесплатная и идеально оптимизирована, потому что на компьютере управлять и даже нахер поехать невозможно | Я разбил все тачки. Но остался он, он сшибал всё на своём пути, лишь бы добраться до меня, коровы и пенсионерки разлетались в стороны на мясные ошмётки, он нёсся к своей цели, он был непоколебим, не сгибаем, он нагнул саму игру, его было невозможно уничтожить. Имя ему. ИВАН! 
и вот когда он влетел в меня и сшиб с трассы он крикнул:

а я в ответ:
- Ты что Д0лб@eб? мы в гонки играем.

Reviews:
This game has a relatively steep learning curve, but in a way that feels so rewarding rather than painful. You can really feel yourself slowly improving and getting better, and it feels so good!
It is so cool to just be a different type of rhythm game! The enemies all move in different patterns, and when you finally get in sync with them, it feels so good!
Much recommended!! | 好玩的就是我实在是太菜了第二关就玩不下去了。有一说一这游戏成就定这么难的吗，玩了7个小时回头一看61个成就达成了0个真的笑死。 | This rhythm game is quite hardcore, and has a steep learning curve. At the beginning you will struggle even on the 1st zone, but the longer you play, the better you begin to feel the game. In a way I would compare it with Osu, but it's a different game of course. Definitely recommend for musicians and all the people interested in playing RHYTHM GAMES | Can I pass level 2? No! Does that stop me from playing for hours? Also no. It’s a fun rhythm game. I enjoy learning the enemies as well as different character and game types. Just now learning about the different mods in workshop. | I bought this game in early access so many years ago. It was my first early access game as a new PC gamer. It was and still is an amazing experience that I'll never forget. I even bought it again on Nintendo Switch. My girlfriend at the time, who had never played and never would play the game, bought me the singing merchant plushy for my Birthday. It was the first time a girl had gifted me something so thoughtful and personally endearing. 

When we broke up years later, she took our cats, our friends, my heart, and the singing merchant. I can still hear his voice and it makes me sad.

Reviews:
Malgré mon amour pour l'Oeil Noir, jeu de rôle des années 1980 dont la 5e edition (de 2016) a beaucoup plu ici entre amis, pour une campagne de plusieurs mois, BLACKGUARDS n'est pas satisfaisant.

Il reprend les ingrédients du 1, sans améliorer la recette.
On se retrouvera ainsi avec un moteur de jeu poussif qui ralentit même sur un pc de compétition, mais surtout des combats contre 12-20 ennemis, dont on attendra patiemment le tour; chaque map nécessitant de se plonger dans un affrontement qui s'éternise mollement et risque fort de mal finir -Blackguards n'a jamais été facile-, et qu'il faudra donc recommencer.

De plus, les références au JDR ne toucheront que les fans, rien n'étant prévu pour initier les néophytes.

10 ans après, je conseille de le laisser reposer en paix, et se tourner vers d'autres tactical RPGs plus frais, comme Naheulbeuk par exemple, qui sous ses airs de blague, s'avère très confortable, énergique, subtil, et en un mot, excellent.
 | [h2]Blackguards 2[/h2]

Has a total of [b]8[/b] trading cards. | mataram o gato na cena inicial do jogo | ich finde es interresant. | хардкорная тактическая РПГ

Reviews:
It's a fresh take on the survival genre with a very nice art/atmosphere. 

The controls are clumsy sometimes + once I had a bug that cost me a run (there was a land pocket which cannot be escaped without a raft motor, so I was stuck there forever). Otherwise, the gameplay is addictive and makes you want to try beating the game over and over again. I played the permadeath mode right from the beginning and it took me ~7 runs before I made it to the end. | art is good
